description: In November 1958, the American teenager Katey Miller moves with her parents and her younger sister to Havana. Her father is an executive of Ford expatriated to Cuba, and Katey is an ...                See full summary »

name: Little Miss Sunshine
actors: Steve Carell, Toni Collette, Greg Kinnear, Abigail Breslin
description: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

name: The Pursuit of Happyness
actors: Will Smith, Thandie Newton, Jaden Smith, Brian Howe
description: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

name: The Da Vinci Code
actors: Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou, Jean Reno, Ian McKellen
description: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

name: The Devil Wears Prada
actors: Anne Hathaway, Meryl Streep, Adrian Grenier, Emily Blunt
description: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.

name: The Illusionist
actors: Edward Norton, Jessica Biel, Paul Giamatti, Rufus Sewell
description: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

name: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
actors: Sacha Baron Cohen, Ken Davitian, Luenell, Chester
description: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world. With a documentary crew in tow, Borat becomes more interested in locating and marrying Pamela Anderson.

name: Cars
actors: Owen Wilson, Bonnie Hunt, Paul Newman, Larry the Cable Guy
description: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

name: The Lives of Others
actors: Ulrich Mühe, Martina Gedeck, Sebastian Koch, Ulrich Tukur
description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

name: Inside Man
actors: Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer
description: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

name: Mission: Impossible III
actors: Tom Cruise, Michelle Monaghan, Ving Rhames, Philip Seymour Hoffman
description: IMF Agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fiancee in response.

name: Lucky Number Slevin
actors: Josh Hartnett, Ben Kingsley, Morgan Freeman, Lucy Liu
description: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss. Slevin is under constant surveillance by relentless Detective Brikowski as well as the infamous assassin Goodkat and finds himself having to hatch his own ingenious plot to get them before they get him.

name: Night at the Museum
actors: Ben Stiller, Carla Gugino, Ricky Gervais, Dick Van Dyke
description: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.

name: Click
actors: Adam Sandler, Kate Beckinsale, Christopher Walken, David Hasselhoff
description: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life. Complications arise when the remote starts to overrule his choices.

name: Deja Vu
actors: Denzel Washington, Paula Patton, Jim Caviezel, Val Kilmer
description: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an A.T.F. agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber, but soon finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims.

name: Babel
actors: Brad Pitt, Cate Blanchett, Gael García Bernal, Mohamed Akhzam
description: Tragedy strikes a married couple on vacation in the Moroccan desert, touching off an interlocking story involving four different families.

name: Apocalypto
actors: Gerardo Taracena, Raoul Max Trujillo, Dalia Hernández, Rudy Youngblood
description: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

name: Superman Returns
actors: Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth, James Marsden
description: Superman returns to Earth after spending five years in space examining his homeworld Krypton. But he finds things have changed while he was gone, and he must once again prove himself important to the world.

name: Ice Age: The Meltdown
actors: Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Seann William Scott
description: Manny, Sid, and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny, in fact, is not the last of the woolly mammoths.

name: Crank
actors: Jason Statham, Amy Smart, Carlos Sanz, Jose Pablo Cantillo
description: Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops.

name: The Holiday
actors: Kate Winslet, Cameron Diaz, Jude Law, Jack Black
description: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

name: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
actors: Ben Whishaw, Dustin Hoffman, Alan Rickman, Francesc Albiol
description: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.

name: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
actors: Lucas Black, Zachery Ty Bryan, Shad Moss, Damien Marzette
description: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

name: The Fountain
actors: Hugh Jackman, Rachel Weisz, Sean Patrick Thomas, Ellen Burstyn
description: As a modern-day scientist, Tommy is struggling with mortality, desperately searching for the medical breakthrough that will save the life of his cancer-stricken wife, Izzi.

name: Stranger Than Fiction
actors: Will Ferrell, Emma Thompson, Dustin Hoffman, Queen Latifah
description: An I.R.S. auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

name: Silent Hill
actors: Radha Mitchell, Laurie Holden, Sean Bean, Deborah Kara Unger
description: A woman, Rose, goes in search for her adopted daughter within the confines of a strange, desolate town called Silent Hill.

name: Rocky Balboa
actors: Sylvester Stallone, Antonio Tarver, Milo Ventimiglia, Burt Young
description: Thirty years after the ring of the first bell, Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement and dons his gloves for his final fight; against the reigning heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.

name: Underworld: Evolution
actors: Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman, Bill Nighy, Tony Curran
description: Picking up directly from the previous movie, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

name: Saw III
actors: Tobin Bell, Shawnee Smith, Angus Macfadyen, Bahar Soomekh
description: Jigsaw abducts a doctor in order to keep himself alive while he watches his new apprentice put an unlucky citizen named Jeff through a brutal test.

name: The Last King of Scotland
actors: James McAvoy, Forest Whitaker, Gillian Anderson, Kerry Washington
description: Based on the events of the brutal Ugandan dictator Idi Amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s.

name: Happy Feet
directors: George Miller, Warren Coleman, Judy Morris
actors: Elijah Wood, Brittany Murphy, Hugh Jackman, Robin Williams
description: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

name: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
actors: Will Ferrell, John C. Reilly, Sacha Baron Cohen, Gary Cole
description: Number one NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion are put to the test.

name: The Hills Have Eyes
actors: Ted Levine, Kathleen Quinlan, Dan Byrd, Emilie de Ravin
description: A suburban American family is being stalked by a group of psychotic people who live in the desert, far away from civilization.

name: Over the Hedge
actors: Bruce Willis, Garry Shandling, Steve Carell, Wanda Sykes
description: A scheming raccoon fools a mismatched family of forest creatures into helping him repay a debt of food, by invading the new suburban sprawl that popped up while they were hibernating...and learns a lesson about family himself.

name: Letters from Iwo Jima
actors: Ken Watanabe, Kazunari Ninomiya, Tsuyoshi Ihara, Ryo Kase
description: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.

name: She's the Man
actors: Amanda Bynes, Laura Ramsey, Channing Tatum, Vinnie Jones
description: When her brother decides to ditch for a couple weeks, Viola heads over to his elite boarding school, disguised as him, and proceeds to fall for one of his soccer teammates, and soon learns she's not the only one with romantic troubles.

name: Smokin' Aces
actors: Jeremy Piven, Ryan Reynolds, Ray Liotta, Joseph Ruskin
description: When a Las Vegas performer-turned-snitch named Buddy Israel decides to turn state's evidence and testify against the mob, it seems that a whole lot of people would like to make sure he's no longer breathing.

name: Idiocracy
actors: Luke Wilson, Maya Rudolph, Dax Shepard, Terry Crews
description: Private Joe Bauers, the definition of "average American", is selected by the Pentagon to be the guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program. Forgotten, he awakes five centuries in the future. He discovers a society so incredibly dumbed down that he's easily the most intelligent person alive.

name: The Lake House
actors: Keanu Reeves, Sandra Bullock, Christopher Plummer, Ebon Moss-Bachrach
description: A lonely doctor, who once occupied an unusual lakeside house, begins exchanging love letters with its former resident, a frustrated architect. They must try to unravel the mystery behind their extraordinary romance before it's too late.

name: Snakes on a Plane
actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Julianna Margulies, Nathan Phillips, Rachel Blanchard
description: An F.B.I. Agent takes on a plane full of deadly venomous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

name: Clerks II
actors: Brian O'Halloran, Jeff Anderson, Rosario Dawson, Jason Mewes
description: A calamity at Dante and Randal's shops sends them looking for new horizons - but they ultimately settle at the fast food empire Mooby's.

name: 16 Blocks
actors: Bruce Willis, Yasiin Bey, David Morse, Jenna Stern
description: An aging alcoholic cop is assigned the task of escorting a witness from police custody to a courthouse 16 blocks away. There are, however, chaotic forces at work that prevent them from making it in one piece.

name: Final Destination 3
actors: Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Ryan Merriman, Kris Lemche, Alexz Johnson
description: A student's premonition of a deadly rollercoaster ride saves her life and a lucky few, but not from Death itself, which seeks out those who escaped their fate.

name: Eragon
actors: Ed Speleers, Sienna Guillory, Jeremy Irons, John Malkovich
description: In his homeland of Alagaesia, a farm boy happens upon a dragon's egg -- a discovery that leads him on a predestined journey where he realizes he's the one person who can defend his home against an evil king.

name: Accepted
actors: Justin Long, Jonah Hill, Blake Lively, Adam Herschman
description: A high school slacker who's rejected by every school he applies to opts to create his own institution of higher learning, the South Harmon Institute of Technology, on a rundown piece of property near his hometown.

name: The Break-Up
actors: Jennifer Aniston, Vince Vaughn, Jon Favreau, Joey Lauren Adams
description: In a bid to keep their luxurious condo from their significant other, a couple's break-up proceeds to get uglier and nastier by the moment.

name: Flags of Our Fathers
actors: Ryan Phillippe, Barry Pepper, Joseph Cross, Jesse Bradford
description: The life stories of the six men who raised the flag at the Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in World War II.

name: This Is England
actors: Thomas Turgoose, Stephen Graham, Jo Hartley, Andrew Shim
description: A young boy becomes friends with a gang of skinheads. Friends soon become like family, and relationships will be pushed to the very limit.

name: Scary Movie 4
actors: Anna Faris, Regina Hall, Craig Bierko, Bill Pullman
description: Cindy finds out the house she lives in is haunted by a little boy and goes on a quest to find out who killed him and why. Also, Alien "Tr-iPods" are invading the world and she has to uncover the secret in order to stop them.

name: Step Up
actors: Channing Tatum, Jenna Dewan, Damaine Radcliff, De'Shawn Washington
description: Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora.

name: Miami Vice
actors: Colin Farrell, Jamie Foxx, Li Gong, Naomie Harris
description: Based on the 1980s TV action/drama, this update focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined.

name: Flushed Away
actors: Hugh Jackman, Kate Winslet, Ian McKellen, Jean Reno
description: The story of an uptown rat that gets flushed down the toilet from his penthouse apartment, ending in the sewers of London, where he has to learn a whole new and different way of life.

name: The Fall
actors: Lee Pace, Catinca Untaru, Justine Waddell, Kim Uylenbroek
description: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastic story of five mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality blurs as the tale advances.

name: Little Children
actors: Kate Winslet, Jennifer Connelly, Patrick Wilson, Jackie Earle Haley
description: The lives of two lovelorn spouses from separate marriages, a registered sex offender, and a disgraced ex-police officer intersect as they struggle to resist their vulnerabilities and temptations in suburban Massachusetts.

name: A Scanner Darkly
actors: Keanu Reeves, Winona Ryder, Robert Downey Jr., Rory Cochrane
description: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

name: Rang De Basanti
actors: Aamir Khan, Soha Ali Khan, Siddharth, Sharman Joshi
description: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the extremist freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.

name: The Queen
actors: Helen Mirren, Michael Sheen, James Cromwell, Alex Jennings
description: After the death of Princess Diana, Queen Elizabeth II struggles with her reaction to a sequence of events nobody could have predicted.

name: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
actors: Jack Black, Kyle Gass, JR Reed, Ronnie James Dio
description: To become the greatest band of all time, two slacker, wannabe-rockers set out on a quest to steal a legendary guitar pick that gives its holders incredible guitar skills, from a maximum security Rock and Roll museum.

name: Alpha Dog
actors: Emile Hirsch, Justin Timberlake, Anton Yelchin, Bruce Willis
description: Johnny and a couple pals kidnap Jake's 15-year-old brother, Zach, then assigns his buddy Frankie to be Zach's minder. They develop a brotherly friendship. Zach parties with his captors as things begin to spin out of control.

name: Rescue Dawn
actors: Christian Bale, Steve Zahn, Jeremy Davies, Zach Grenier
description: A U.S. fighter pilot's epic struggle of survival after being shot down on a mission over Laos during the Vietnam War.

name: The Good Shepherd
actors: Matt Damon, Angelina Jolie, Robert De Niro, Alec Baldwin
description: The tumultuous early history of the Central Intelligence Agency is viewed through the prism of one man's life.

name: Running Scared
actors: Paul Walker, Cameron Bright, Chazz Palminteri, Vera Farmiga
description: A low-ranking thug is entrusted by his crime boss to dispose of a gun that killed corrupt cops, but things get out of control when the gun ends up in wrong hands.

name: United 93
actors: David Alan Basche, Olivia Thirlby, Liza Colón-Zayas, J.J. Johnson
description: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on September 11th, 2001 that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.

name: Marie Antoinette
actors: Kirsten Dunst, Jason Schwartzman, Rip Torn, Judy Davis
description: The retelling of France's iconic but ill-fated queen, Marie Antoinette. From her betrothal and marriage to Louis XVI at 15 to her reign as queen at 19 and to the end of her reign as queen, and ultimately the fall of Versailles.

name: Poseidon
actors: Richard Dreyfuss, Kurt Russell, Emmy Rossum, Josh Lucas
description: On New Year's Eve, the luxury ocean liner Poseidon capsizes after being swamped by a rogue wave. The survivors are left to fight for their lives as they attempt to escape the sinking ship.

name: Lady in the Water
actors: Paul Giamatti, Bryce Dallas Howard, Jeffrey Wright, Bob Balaban
description: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

name: Monster House
actors: Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Ryan Whitney Newman
description: Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing, scary monster.

name: Volver
actors: Penélope Cruz, Carmen Maura, Lola Dueñas, Blanca Portillo
description: After her death, a mother returns to her home town in order to fix the situations she couldn't resolve during her life.

name: The Painted Veil
actors: Naomi Watts, Edward Norton, Liev Schreiber, Catherine An
description: A British medical doctor fights a cholera epidemic in a small Chinese village, while being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife.

name: Gwoemul
actors: Kang-ho Song, Hee-Bong Byun, Hae-il Park, Doona Bae
description: A monster emerges from Seoul's Han River and begins attacking people. One victim's loving family does what it can to rescue her from its clutches.

name: The Guardian
actors: Kevin Costner, Ashton Kutcher, Sela Ward, Melissa Sagemiller
description: A high school swim champion with a troubled past enrolls in the U.S. Coast Guard's "A" School, where legendary rescue swimmer Ben Randall teaches him some hard lessons about loss, love, and self-sacrifice.

name: A Good Year
actors: Russell Crowe, Abbie Cornish, Albert Finney, Marion Cotillard
description: A British investment broker inherits his uncle's chateau and vineyard in Provence, where he spent much of his childhood. He discovers a new laid-back lifestyle as he tries to renovate the estate to be sold.

name: Half Nelson
actors: Ryan Gosling, Anthony Mackie, Shareeka Epps, Jeff Lima
description: An inner-city junior high school teacher with a drug habit forms an unlikely friendship with one of his students after she discovers his secret.

name: Cashback
actors: Sean Biggerstaff, Emilia Fox, Michelle Ryan, Erica Ellis
description: After a painful breakup, Ben develops insomnia. To kill time, he starts working the late night shift at the local supermarket, where his artistic imagination runs wild.

name: Open Season
directors: Roger Allers, Jill Culton, Anthony Stacchi
actors: Ashton Kutcher, Martin Lawrence, Debra Messing, Gary Sinise
description: Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear, finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.

name: Ultraviolet
actors: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright, Nick Chinlund, Sebastien Andrieu
description: A beautiful hæmophage infected with a virus that gives her superhuman powers has to protect a boy in a futuristic world, who is thought to be carrying antigens that would destroy all hæmophages.

name: Scoop
actors: Scarlett Johansson, Hugh Jackman, Jim Dunk, Robert Bathurst
description: An American journalism student in London scoops a big story, and begins an affair with an aristocrat as the incident unfurls.

name: John Tucker Must Die
actors: Jesse Metcalfe, Ashanti, Arielle Kebbel, Sophia Bush
description: Three ex-girlfriends of a serial cheater set up their former lover to fall for the new girl in town so they can watch him get his heart broken.

name: Nacho Libre
actors: Jack Black, Ana de la Reguera, Héctor Jiménez, Darius Rose
description: Berated all his life by those around him, a monk follows his dream and dons a mask to moonlight as a Luchador (Mexican wrestler).

name: The Pink Panther
actors: Steve Martin, Kevin Kline, Jean Reno, Emily Mortimer
description: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau must solve the murder of a famous soccer coach and find out who stole the infamous Pink Panther diamond.

name: You, Me and Dupree
actors: Kate Hudson, Owen Wilson, Matt Dillon, Michael Douglas
description: A best man (Wilson) stays on as a houseguest with the newlyweds, much to the couple's annoyance.

name: World Trade Center
actors: Nicolas Cage, Michael Peña, Maria Bello, Maggie Gyllenhaal
description: Two Port Authority police officers become trapped under the rubble of the World Trade Center.

name: Grandma's Boy
actors: Allen Covert, Linda Cardellini, Shirley Jones, Peter Dante
description: A thirty-five-year-old video game tester has to move in with his grandma and her two old lady roommates.

name: Notes on a Scandal
actors: Cate Blanchett, Judi Dench, Andrew Simpson, Tom Georgeson
description: A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her 15-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond platonic friendship.

name: Slither
actors: Nathan Fillion, Elizabeth Banks, Michael Rooker, Don Thompson
description: A small town is taken over by an alien plague, turning residents into zombies and all forms of mutant monsters.

name: Huo yuanjia
actors: Jet Li, Li Sun, Yong Dong, Yun Qu
description: A biography of Chinese Martial Arts Master Huo Yuanjia, who is the founder and spiritual guru of the Jin Wu Sports Federation.

name: The Black Dahlia
actors: Josh Hartnett, Aaron Eckhart, Scarlett Johansson, Hilary Swank
description: Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the "Black Dahlia" murder investigation.

name: Zwartboek
actors: Carice van Houten, Sebastian Koch, Thom Hoffman, Halina Reijn
description: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.

name: Paris, je t'aime
directors: Olivier Assayas, Frédéric Auburtin, Emmanuel Benbihy, Gurinder Chadha, Sylvain Chomet, Ethan Coen, Joel Coen, Isabel Coixet, Wes Craven, Alfonso Cuarón, Gérard Depardieu, Christopher Doyle, Richard LaGravenese, Vincenzo Natali, Alexander Payne, Bruno Podalydès, Walter Salles, Oliver Schmitz, Nobuhiro Suwa, Daniela Thomas, Tom Tykwer, Gus Van Sant
actors: Juliette Binoche, Leonor Watling, Ludivine Sagnier, Fanny Ardant
description: Through the neighborhoods of Paris, love is veiled, revealed, imitated, sucked dry, reinvented and awakened.

name: Failure to Launch
actors: Matthew McConaughey, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Bates, Terry Bradshaw
description: A thirty-something is still living with his parents until they hire an interventionist to help him graduate out of the house. That's when the fun begins.

name: La science des rêves
actors: Gael García Bernal, Charlotte Gainsbourg, Miou-Miou, Alain Chabat
description: A man entranced by his dreams and imagination is love-struck with a French woman and feels he can show her his world.

name: Dreamgirls
actors: Beyoncé, Jamie Foxx, Eddie Murphy, Danny Glover
description: A trio of black female soul singers cross over to the pop charts in the early 1960s, facing their own personal struggles along the way.

name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning
actors: Jordana Brewster, Matt Bomer, Diora Baird, Taylor Handley
description: Before being sent to serve in Vietnam, two brothers and their girlfriends take one last road trip, but when they get into an accident, a terrifying experience will take them to a secluded house of horrors, with a chainsaw-wielding killer.

name: Beerfest
actors: Jay Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, Steve Lemme, Paul Soter
description: Two brothers travel to Germany for Oktoberfest, only to stumble upon a secret, centuries-old competition described as a "Fight Club" with beer games.

name: Invincible
actors: Mark Wahlberg, Greg Kinnear, Elizabeth Banks, Kevin Conway
description: Based on the story of Vince Papale, a 30-year-old bartender from South Philadelphia who overcame long odds to play for the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles in 1976.

name: Papurika
actors: Megumi Hayashibara, Tôru Emori, Katsunosuke Hori, Tôru Furuya
description: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all Hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

name: The Wicker Man
actors: Nicolas Cage, Ellen Burstyn, Leelee Sobieski, Kate Beahan
description: A sheriff investigating the disappearance of a young girl from a small island discovers there's a larger mystery to solve among the island's secretive, neo-pagan community.

name: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
actors: Uma Thurman, Luke Wilson, Anna Faris, Rainn Wilson
description: When a regular guy dumps a superhero for her neediness, she uses her powers to make his life a living hell.

name: Black Snake Moan
actors: Christina Ricci, Samuel L. Jackson, Justin Timberlake, S. Epatha Merkerson
description: A God-fearing bluesman takes to a wild young woman who, as a victim of childhood sexual abuse, looks everywhere for love, never quite finding it.

name: Penelope
actors: Christina Ricci, James McAvoy, Reese Witherspoon, Richard E. Grant
description: A modern romantic tale about a young aristocratic heiress born under a curse that can only be broken when she finds true love with "one who will accept her as one of their own."

name: Eight Below
actors: Paul Walker, Jason Biggs, Bruce Greenwood, Moon Bloodgood
description: Brutal cold forces two Antarctic explorers to leave their team of sled dogs behind as they fend for their survival.

name: Date Movie
actors: Alyson Hannigan, Adam Campbell, Fred Willard, Jennifer Coolidge
description: Spoof of romantic comedies which focuses on a man, his crush, his parents, and her father.

name: Firewall
actors: Harrison Ford, Virginia Madsen, Paul Bettany, Carly Schroeder
description: A security specialist is forced into robbing the bank that he's protecting, as a bid to pay off his family's ransom.

name: The Omen
actors: Liev Schreiber, Julia Stiles, Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick, David Thewlis
description: An American official realizes that his young son may literally be the Devil incarnate.

name: We Are Marshall
actors: Matthew McConaughey, Matthew Fox, Anthony Mackie, David Strathairn
description: When a plane crash claims the lives of members of the Marshall University football team and some of its fans, the team's new coach and his surviving players try to keep the football program alive.

name: RV
actors: Robin Williams, Cheryl Hines, Kristin Chenoweth, JoJo
description: Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers.

name: Toki o kakeru shôjo
actors: Riisa Naka, Takuya Ishida, Mitsutaka Itakura, Ayami Kakiuchi
description: A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

name: Wristcutters: A Love Story
actors: Patrick Fugit, Shea Whigham, Tom Waits, Will Arnett
description: A film set in a strange afterlife way station that has been reserved for people who have committed suicide.

name: Just My Luck
actors: Lindsay Lohan, Chris Pine, Samaire Armstrong, Bree Turner
description: Manhattanite Ashley is known to many as the luckiest woman around. After a chance encounter with a down-and-out young man, however, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his.

name: Inland Empire
actors: Laura Dern, Jeremy Irons, Justin Theroux, Karolina Gruszka
description: As an actress starts to adopt the persona of her character in a film, her world starts to become nightmarish and surreal.

name: Tristan + Isolde
actors: James Franco, Sophia Myles, Rufus Sewell, David O'Hara
description: An affair between the second in line to Britain's throne and the princess of the feuding Irish spells doom for the young lovers.

name: Ne le dis à personne
actors: François Cluzet, Marie-Josée Croze, André Dussollier, Kristin Scott Thomas
description: An accidental discovery near a doctor's estate stirs up some painful memories eight years after his wife's hideous murder, and now, things are bound to take a turn for the unexpected. Does the good doctor know more than he's letting on?

name: Littleman
actors: Shawn Wayans, Marlon Wayans, Kerry Washington, John Witherspoon
description: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

name: The Sentinel
actors: Michael Douglas, Kiefer Sutherland, Kim Basinger, Eva Longoria
description: A Secret Service agent is framed as the mole in an assassination attempt on the President. He must clear his name and foil another assassination attempt while on the run from a Secret Service Protective Intelligence Division agent.

name: The Benchwarmers
actors: David Spade, Jon Heder, Rob Schneider, Jon Lovitz
description: A trio of guys try and make up for missed opportunities in childhood by forming a three-player baseball team to compete against standard children baseball squads.

name: The Covenant
actors: Steven Strait, Sebastian Stan, Toby Hemingway, Taylor Kitsch
description: Four young men who belong to a New England supernatural legacy are forced to battle a fifth power long thought to have died out. Meanwhile, jealousy and suspicion threaten to tear them apart.

name: The Grudge 2

description: Three interwoven stories about a terrible curse. A young woman encounters a malevolent supernatural force while searching for her missing sister in Tokyo; a mean high school prank goes horribly wrong; a woman with a deadly secret moves into a Chicago apartment building.

name: The Wind that Shakes the Barley
actors: Cillian Murphy, Pádraic Delaney, Liam Cunningham, Orla Fitzgerald
description: Against the backdrop of the Irish War of Independence, two brothers fight a guerrilla war against British forces.

name: Gridiron Gang
actors: Dwayne Johnson, Xzibit, L. Scott Caldwell, Leon Rippy

name: DOA: Dead or Alive

name: Employee of the Month
actors: Jessica Simpson, Dane Cook, Dax Shepard, Andy Dick
description: A slacker competes with a repeat winner for the "Employee of the Month" title at work, in order to gain the affections of a new female employee.

description: During China's Tang dynasty the emperor has taken the princess of a neighboring province as wife. She has borne him two sons and raised his eldest. Now his control over his dominion is complete, including the royal family itself.

description: Michael'd have a great job, still have his 4 best friends, and be in love with a beautiful girl at 30. He loves Jenna but his life seems predictable until he meets a college girl. It seems that everybody's having relationship problems.

name: When a Stranger Calls
actors: Camilla Belle, Tommy Flanagan, Katie Cassidy, Tessa Thompson
description: During a babysitting gig, a high-school student is harassed by an increasingly threatening prank caller.

name: Glory Road
actors: Josh Lucas, Derek Luke, Austin Nichols, Jon Voight

name: Flyboys

actors: Sanjay Dutt, Arshad Warsi, Vidya Balan, Jimmy Sheirgill
description: Munna Bhai embarks on a journey with Mahatma Gandhi in order to fight against a corrupt property dealer.

name: Black Sheep
actors: Oliver Driver, Nathan Meister, Tammy Davis, Matthew Chamberlain

name: Big Momma's House 2
actors: Martin Lawrence, Emily Procter, Nia Long, Zachary Levi

name: It's a Boy Girl Thing
actors: Samaire Armstrong, Kevin Zegers, Sherry Miller, Robert Joy

name: Aquamarine
actors: Emma Roberts, JoJo, Sara Paxton, Jake McDorman

name: Severance

name: The Marine

name: Man of the Year
actors: Robin Williams, Laura Linney, Lewis Black, Christopher Walken

actors: Amber Heard, Anson Mount, Whitney Able, Michael Welch
description: A group of high-schoolers invite Mandy Lane, an innocent, desirable girl, to a weekend party on a secluded ranch. While the festivities rage on, the number of revelers begins to drop mysteriously.

actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Sidse Babett Knudsen, Rolf Lassgård, Neeral Mulchandani

name: Hors de prix
actors: Audrey Tautou, Gad Elmaleh, Marie-Christine Adam, Vernon Dobtcheff

name: Fanaa
actors: Aamir Khan, Kajol, Rishi Kapoor, Tabu

name: Gedo senki
actors: Timothy Dalton, Willem Dafoe, Mariska Hargitay, Jun'ichi Okada
description: In a mythical land, a man and a young boy investigate a series of unusual occurrences.

name: Stay Alive
actors: Jon Foster, Samaire Armstrong, Frankie Muniz, Jimmi Simpson

name: Big Nothing
actors: David Schwimmer, Simon Pegg, Alice Eve, Jon Polito

name: Unknown
actors: Jim Caviezel, Greg Kinnear, Bridget Moynahan, Joe Pantoliano
description: Five men wake up in a locked-down warehouse with no memory of who they are. They are forced to figure out who is good and who is bad to stay alive.

name: Goya's Ghosts
actors: Javier Bardem, Natalie Portman, Stellan Skarsgård, Randy Quaid
description: Painter Francisco Goya faces a scandal involving his muse, who is labeled a heretic by a monk.

name: Seraphim Falls
actors: Pierce Brosnan, Liam Neeson, Anjelica Huston, Michael Wincott

name: Ils

name: Fido
actors: Kesun Loder, Billy Connolly, Carrie-Anne Moss, David Kaye
description: In an Earthly world resembling the 1950s, a cloud of space radiation has shrouded the planet, resulting in the dead becoming zombies that desire live human flesh. A company called Zomcon ...                See full summary »

name: Pulse
actors: Kristen Bell, Rick Gonzalez, Christina Milian, Ian Somerhalder
description: When their computer hacker friend accidentally channels a mysterious wireless signal, a group of co-eds rally to stop a terrifying evil from taking over the world.

description: A battle between the world's two greatest minds begins when Light Yagami finds the Death Note, a notebook with the power to kill, and decides to rid the world of criminals.

name: Hatchet

actors: Queen Latifah, LL Cool J, Timothy Hutton, Giancarlo Esposito

name: Barnyard

name: Peaceful Warrior
actors: Scott Mechlowicz, Nick Nolte, Amy Smart, Tim DeKay

name: See No Evil

When one of the teens is captured, those who remain - a group that includes the cop who put a bullet in Goodnight's head four years ago - band together to survive against the brutal killer.

name: Friends with Money
actors: Jennifer Aniston, Frances McDormand, Catherine Keener, Joan Cusack

Recently awakened President Staton (Quaid) even wants in on the craze, as he signs up for the potential explosive season finale.

name: Take the Lead
actors: Antonio Banderas, Rob Brown, Yaya DaCosta, Alfre Woodard

actors: George Clooney, Cate Blanchett, Tobey Maguire, Beau Bridges

name: Amazing Grace
actors: Ioan Gruffudd, Albert Finney, Michael Gambon, Romola Garai

actors: Michelle Trachtenberg, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Lacey Chabert, Katie Cassidy

actors: Sean Penn, Jude Law, Kate Winslet, Anthony Hopkins

name: Fast Food Nation
actors: Greg Kinnear, Bruce Willis, Catalina Sandino Moreno, Wilmer Valderrama

name: The Contract
actors: John Cusack, Morgan Freeman, Jamie Anderson, Alice Krige

name: Stormbreaker

name: Catch and Release
actors: Jennifer Garner, Timothy Olyphant, Kevin Smith, Sam Jaeger

name: I Am Legend

name: The Bourne Ultimatum

name: Ratatouille
actors: Brad Garrett, Lou Romano, Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm

name: Transformers
actors: Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Tyrese Gibson

Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

name: Superbad
actors: Michael Cera, Jonah Hill, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, Bill Hader

name: Juno
actors: Ellen Page, Michael Cera, Jennifer Garner, Jason Bateman

name: There Will Be Blood
actors: Daniel Day-Lewis, Paul Dano, Ciarán Hinds, Martin Stringer

name: Spider-Man 3
actors: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Topher Grace, Thomas Haden Church
description: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Brendan Gleeson

name: Hot Fuzz
actors: Simon Pegg, Nick Frost, Martin Freeman, Bill Nighy

name: Zodiac

name: Live Free or Die Hard
actors: Bruce Willis, Justin Long, Timothy Olyphant, Maggie Q

name: American Gangster
actors: Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Josh Brolin

name: Ocean's Thirteen

name: The Simpsons Movie

name: The Mist

description: A freak storm unleashes a species of bloodthirsty creatures on a small town, where a small band of citizens hole up in a supermarket and fight for their lives.

name: Shrek the Third

Princess Fiona, however, rallies a band of royal girlfriends to fend off a coup d'etat by the jilted Prince Charming.

name: Death Proof
actors: Kurt Russell, Zoë Bell, Rosario Dawson, Vanessa Ferlito
description: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

name: 28 Weeks Later

actors: John Cusack, Samuel L. Jackson, Mary McCormack, Paul Birchard
description: A man who specializes in debunking paranormal occurrences checks into the fabled room 1408 in the Dolphin Hotel. Soon after settling in, he confronts genuine terror.

name: Stardust
actors: Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Sienna Miller, Ian McKellen
description: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

name: 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer
actors: Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans, Michael Chiklis

name: Gone Baby Gone
actors: Morgan Freeman, Ed Harris, Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan
description: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

name: Atonement
actors: Keira Knightley, James McAvoy, Brenda Blethyn, Saoirse Ronan

name: Sunshine
actors: Cillian Murphy, Rose Byrne, Chris Evans, Cliff Curtis

name: Eastern Promises

name: The Bucket List
actors: Jack Nicholson, Morgan Freeman, Sean Hayes, Beverly Todd

name: Ghost Rider
actors: Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes, Sam Elliott, Matt Long

name: Paranormal Activity
actors: Katie Featherston, Micah Sloat, Mark Fredrichs, Amber Armstrong
description: After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.

name: Disturbia
actors: Shia LaBeouf, David Morse, Carrie-Anne Moss, Sarah Roemer

name: National Treasure: Book of Secrets

name: P.S. I Love You
actors: Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler, Harry Connick Jr., Lisa Kudrow

name: Planet Terror
actors: Rose McGowan, Freddy Rodríguez, Josh Brolin, Marley Shelton

name: The Number 23

actors: Drew Barrymore, George Lopez, Piper Perabo, Manolo Cardona
description: While on vacation in Mexico, Chloe, a ritzy Beverly Hills chihuahua, finds herself lost and in need of assistance in order to get back home.

name: Strange Wilderness
actors: Steve Zahn, Allen Covert, Justin Long, Jonah Hill

name: Inglourious Basterds

name: Avatar
actors: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Michelle Rodriguez
description: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

name: Up
actors: Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger, Christopher Plummer
description: Seventy-eight year old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his home equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

name: The Hangover
actors: Zach Galifianakis, Bradley Cooper, Justin Bartha, Ed Helms
description: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

name: District 9
actors: Sharlto Copley, David James, Jason Cope, Nathalie Boltt
description: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly finds a kindred spirit in a government agent who is exposed to their biotechnology.

name: Star Trek
actors: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Simon Pegg, Leonard Nimoy
description: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

name: Sherlock Holmes
actors: Robert Downey Jr., Jude Law, Rachel McAdams, Mark Strong
description: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

name: Zombieland

name: (500) Days of Summer
actors: Zooey Deschanel, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Geoffrey Arend, Chloë Grace Moretz
description: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe true love exists, and the young man who falls for her.

name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
actors: Hugh Jackman, Liev Schreiber, Ryan Reynolds, Danny Huston
description: The early years of James Logan, featuring his rivalry with his brother Victor Creed, his service in the special forces team Weapon X, and his experimentation into the metal-lined mutant Wolverine.

name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Michael Gambon
description: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

name: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
actors: Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Tyrese Gibson
description: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.

actors: John Cusack, Thandie Newton, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Amanda Peet
description: A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.

name: Terminator Salvation
actors: Christian Bale, Sam Worthington, Anton Yelchin, Moon Bloodgood
description: In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?

name: Moon
actors: Sam Rockwell, Kevin Spacey, Dominique McElligott, Rosie Shaw

name: Up in the Air
actors: George Clooney, Vera Farmiga, Anna Kendrick, Jason Bateman

name: 3 Idiots
actors: Aamir Khan, Madhavan, Mona Singh, Sharman Joshi

name: The Proposal

name: The Blind Side
actors: Quinton Aaron, Sandra Bullock, Tim McGraw, Jae Head

name: Public Enemies

name: Angels & Demons

actors: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner, Christina Jastrzembska

name: Fast & Furious
actors: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster

name: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
actors: Richard Gere, Joan Allen, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Sarah Roemer
description: A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.

name: Knowing
actors: Nicolas Cage, Chandler Canterbury, Rose Byrne, Lara Robinson

name: The Road
actors: Viggo Mortensen, Charlize Theron, Kodi Smit-McPhee, Robert Duvall
description: In a dangerous post-apocalyptic world, an ailing father defends his son as they slowly travel to the sea.

name: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
actors: Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Eunice Cho
description: When Sid's attempt to adopt three dinosaur eggs gets him abducted by their real mother to an underground lost world, his friends attempt to rescue him.

name: Män som hatar kvinnor
actors: Michael Nyqvist, Noomi Rapace, Ewa Fröling, Lena Endre
description: A journalist is aided by a young female hacker in his search for the killer of a woman who has been dead for forty years.

name: Mr. Nobody
actors: Jared Leto, Sarah Polley, Diane Kruger, Linh Dan Pham
description: A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? Infinite possibilities arise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.

name: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
actors: Dennis Quaid, Channing Tatum, Marlon Wayans, Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje
description: An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.

name: The Ugly Truth

name: I Love You, Man

name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
actors: Anna Faris, Bill Hader, Bruce Campbell, James Caan

name: Coraline
actors: Dakota Fanning, Teri Hatcher, John Hodgman, Jennifer Saunders
description: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

name: Drag Me to Hell
actors: Alison Lohman, Justin Long, Ruth Livier, Lorna Raver

name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
actors: George Clooney, Meryl Streep, Bill Murray, Jason Schwartzman
description: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

name: Orphan
actors: Vera Farmiga, Peter Sarsgaard, Isabelle Fuhrman, CCH Pounder

name: The Taking of Pelham 123

name: He's Just Not That Into You

name: Adventureland
actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Kristen Stewart, Ryan Reynolds, Kelsey Ledgin

name: The Lovely Bones
actors: Rachel Weisz, Mark Wahlberg, Saoirse Ronan, Susan Sarandon

actors: Rhona Mitra, Michael Sheen, Bill Nighy, Steven Mackintosh
description: An origins story centered on the centuries-old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their onetime slaves, the Lycans.

name: Invictus

name: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
actors: Christopher Plummer, Lily Cole, Heath Ledger, Andrew Garfield
description: A traveling theater company gives its audience much more than they were expecting.

name: Pandorum
actors: Dennis Quaid, Ben Foster, Cam Gigandet, Antje Traue

name: Monsters vs. Aliens

name: Brüno
actors: Sacha Baron Cohen, Gustaf Hammarsten, Clifford Bañagale, Chibundu Orukwowu
description: Flamboyant and gay Austrian Brüno looks for new fame in America.

name: The Time Traveler's Wife
actors: Eric Bana, Rachel McAdams, Ron Livingston, Michelle Nolden
description: A Chicago librarian has a gene that causes him to involuntarily time travel, creating complications in his marriage.

name: Crank: High Voltage

name: State of Play
actors: Russell Crowe, Rachel McAdams, Ben Affleck, Helen Mirren

actors: Elijah Wood, Jennifer Connelly, Crispin Glover, Christopher Plummer
description: A rag doll that awakens in a postapocalyptic future holds the key to humanity's salvation.

name: Gamer
actors: Gerard Butler, Michael C. Hall, Ludacris, Amber Valletta

name: An Education

name: Jennifer's Body
actors: Megan Fox, Amanda Seyfried, Adam Brody, Johnny Simmons

name: Antichrist
actors: Willem Dafoe, Charlotte Gainsbourg, Storm Acheche Sahlstrøm

name: Brothers
actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Natalie Portman, Tobey Maguire, Sam Shepard

actors: Philip Seymour Hoffman, Bill Nighy, Nick Frost, Michael Hadley

name: Push
actors: Camilla Belle, Dakota Fanning, Chris Evans, Colin Ford

name: A Single Man
actors: Colin Firth, Julianne Moore, Matthew Goode, Nicholas Hoult

name: Where the Wild Things Are
actors: Max Records, Catherine O'Hara, Forest Whitaker, Pepita Emmerichs
description: Yearning for escape and adventure, a young boy runs away from home and sails to an island filled with creatures that take him in as their king.

name: Julie & Julia
actors: Amy Adams, Meryl Streep, Chris Messina, Stanley Tucci

name: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
actors: Kevin James, Keir O'Donnell, Jayma Mays, Raini Rodriguez
description: When a shopping mall is taken over by a gang of organized crooks, it's up to a mild-mannered security guard to save the day.

name: Exam

name: Bride Wars
actors: Kate Hudson, Anne Hathaway, Candice Bergen, Bryan Greenberg

name: Saw VI
actors: Tobin Bell, Costas Mandylor, Mark Rolston, Betsy Russell
description: Agent Strahm is dead, and FBI agent Erickson draws nearer to Hoffman. Meanwhile, a pair of insurance executives find themselves in another game set by Jigsaw.

name: A Christmas Carol
actors: Jim Carrey, Gary Oldman, Colin Firth, Steve Valentine

name: Triangle
actors: Melissa George, Joshua McIvor, Jack Taylor, Michael Dorman

name: Friday the 13th
actors: Jared Padalecki, Amanda Righetti, Derek Mears, Danielle Panabaker
description: A group of young adults discover a boarded up Camp Crystal Lake, where they soon encounter Jason Voorhees and his deadly intentions.

name: The Final Destination
actors: Nick Zano, Krista Allen, Andrew Fiscella, Bobby Campo
description: After a young man's premonition of a deadly race-car crash helps saves the lives of his peers, Death sets out to collect those who evaded their end.

name: Un prophète
actors: Tahar Rahim, Niels Arestrup, Adel Bencherif, Reda Kateb
description: A young Arab man is sent to a French prison.

name: Splice
actors: Adrien Brody, Sarah Polley, Delphine Chanéac, Brandon McGibbon
description: Genetic engineers Clive Nicoli and Elsa Kast hope to achieve fame by successfully splicing together the DNA of different animals to create new hybrid animals for medical use.

name: I Love You Phillip Morris
actors: Jim Carrey, Ewan McGregor, Leslie Mann, Rodrigo Santoro
description: A cop turns con man once he comes out of the closet. Once imprisoned, he meets the second love of his life, whom he'll stop at nothing to be with.

name: The International
actors: Clive Owen, Naomi Watts, Armin Mueller-Stahl, Ulrich Thomsen
description: An Interpol agent attempts to expose a high-profile financial institution's role in an international arms dealing ring.

name: Year One
actors: Jack Black, Michael Cera, Olivia Wilde, Oliver Platt

name: Flickan som lekte med elden

name: The Box
actors: Cameron Diaz, James Marsden, Frank Langella, James Rebhorn
description: A small wooden box arrives on the doorstep of a married couple, who know that opening it will grant them a million dollars and kill someone they don't know.

name: My Sister's Keeper

name: Harry Brown
actors: Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer, David Bradley, Charlie Creed-Miles
description: An elderly ex-serviceman and widower looks to avenge his best friend's murder by doling out his own form of justice.

name: It's Complicated
actors: Meryl Streep, Steve Martin, Alec Baldwin, John Krasinski
description: When attending their son's college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. But the complicated fact is they're divorced and he's remarried.

name: Crazy Heart
actors: Jeff Bridges, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Colin Farrell, James Keane
description: A faded country music musician is forced to reassess his dysfunctional life during a doomed romance that also inspires him.

name: The Last House on the Left
actors: Garret Dillahunt, Monica Potter, Tony Goldwyn, Michael Bowen

name: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past

name: The Uninvited
actors: Emily Browning, Arielle Kebbel, Elizabeth Banks, David Strathairn

name: The Bad Lieutenant: Port of Call - New Orleans
actors: Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes, Russell M. Haeuser, Val Kilmer
description: Terence McDonagh is a drug- and gambling-addled detective in post-Katrina New Orleans investigating the killing of five Senegalese immigrants.

name: Case 39
actors: Renée Zellweger, Ian McShane, Jodelle Ferland, Bradley Cooper
description: A social worker fights to save a girl from her abusive parents, only to discover that the situation is more dangerous than she ever expected.

name: Confessions of a Shopaholic
actors: Isla Fisher, Hugh Dancy, Krysten Ritter, Joan Cusack
description: A college grad lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City to support where she nurtures her shopping addiction and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur.

name: Youth in Revolt
actors: Michael Cera, Portia Doubleday, Ray Liotta, Jean Smart

name: The Fourth Kind
actors: Milla Jovovich, Elias Koteas, Will Patton, Hakeem Kae-Kazim

name: Kynodontas
actors: Christos Stergioglou, Michele Valley, Angeliki Papoulia, Hristos Passalis

name: The Human Centipede (First Sequence)
actors: Dieter Laser, Ashley C. Williams, Ashlynn Yennie, Akihiro Kitamura
description: A mad scientist kidnaps and mutilates a trio of tourists in order to reassemble them into a human centipede, created by stitching their mouths to each others' rectums.

name: Whatever Works
actors: Evan Rachel Wood, Larry David, Henry Cavill, Adam Brooks
description: A middle-aged, misanthropic divorcée from New York City surprisingly enters a fulfilling, Pygmalion-type relationship with a much younger, unsophisticated Southern girl.

name: Solomon Kane
actors: James Purefoy, Max von Sydow, Rachel Hurd-Wood, Pete Postlethwaite
description: A ruthless mercenary renounces violence after learning his soul is bound for hell. When a young girl is kidnapped and her family slain by a sorcerer's murderous cult, he is forced to fight and seek his redemption slaying evil.

name: Dragonball Evolution
actors: Justin Chatwin, James Marsters, Yun-Fat Chow, Emmy Rossum
description: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.

name: Chloe
actors: Julianne Moore, Amanda Seyfried, Liam Neeson, Max Thieriot
description: Suspecting her husband of infidelity, gynecologist Dr. Catherine Stewart hires an escort named Chloe in order to test his faithfulness. Soon, the relationships between all three intensify.

name: Ninja Assassin
actors: Rain, Rick Yune, Naomie Harris, Joon Lee
description: A young ninja turns his back on the orphanage that raised him, leading to a confrontation with a fellow ninja from the clan.

name: A Perfect Getaway
actors: Milla Jovovich, Steve Zahn, Timothy Olyphant, Kiele Sanchez
description: Two pairs of lovers on a Hawaiian vacation discover that psychopaths are stalking and murdering tourists on the islands.

name: [Rec]²
actors: Jonathan D. Mellor, Manuela Velasco, Óscar Zafra, Ariel Casas
description: In order to ascertain the current situation inside, a supposed medical officer and a GEO team step into the quarantined and ill-fated apartment building.

name: Luftslottet som sprängdes
actors: Michael Nyqvist, Noomi Rapace, Lena Endre, Annika Hallin
description: Lisbeth is recovering in a hospital and awaiting trial for three murders when she is released. Mikael must prove her innocence, but Lisbeth must be willing to share the details of her sordid experiences with the court.

name: Das weiße Band - Eine deutsche Kindergeschichte
actors: Christian Friedel, Ernst Jacobi, Leonie Benesch, Ulrich Tukur
description: Strange events happen in a small village in the north of Germany during the years before World War I, which seem to be ritual punishment. Who is responsible?

name: Agora

name: Whip It

name: The Tourist

description: Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path.

name: Predators
actors: Adrien Brody, Laurence Fishburne, Topher Grace, Alice Braga
description: A group of elite warriors parachute into an unfamiliar jungle and are hunted by members of a merciless alien race.

name: Machete
actors: Danny Trejo, Michelle Rodriguez, Robert De Niro, Jessica Alba

name: Unstoppable
actors: Denzel Washington, Chris Pine, Rosario Dawson, Ethan Suplee
description: With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe.

name: Knight and Day
actors: Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Peter Sarsgaard, Jordi Mollà
description: A young woman gets mixed up with a disgraced spy who is trying to clear his name.

name: Blue Valentine
actors: Ryan Gosling, Michelle Williams, John Doman, Faith Wladyka
description: The relationship of a contemporary married couple, charting their evolution over a span of years by cross-cutting between time periods.

name: The Next Three Days
actors: Russell Crowe, Elizabeth Banks, Liam Neeson, Michael Buie
description: A married couple's life is turned upside down when the wife is accused of a murder.

name: Love & Other Drugs
actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Anne Hathaway, Judy Greer, Oliver Platt
description: A young woman suffering from Parkinson's befriends a drug rep working for Pfizer in 1990s Pittsburgh.

name: Shrek Forever After
actors: Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy, Antonio Banderas
description: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpel rules supreme.

name: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
actors: Logan Lerman, Kevin McKidd, Steve Coogan, Brandon T. Jackson
description: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.

name: Get Him to the Greek
actors: Jonah Hill, Russell Brand, Elisabeth Moss, Rose Byrne
description: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.

name: Hot Tub Time Machine
actors: John Cusack, Rob Corddry, Craig Robinson, Clark Duke
description: A malfunctioning time machine at a ski resort takes a man back to 1986 with his two friends and nephew, where they must relive a fateful night and not change anything to make sure the nephew is born.

name: Tucker and Dale vs Evil
actors: Tyler Labine, Alan Tudyk, Katrina Bowden, Jesse Moss
description: Affable hillbillies Tucker and Dale are on vacation at their dilapidated mountain cabin when they are mistaken for murderers by a group of preppy college students.

name: Resident Evil: Afterlife
actors: Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Wentworth Miller, Kim Coates
description: While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors living in a prison surrounded by the infected who also want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia.

name: The Ghost Writer
actors: Ewan McGregor, Pierce Brosnan, Olivia Williams, Jon Bernthal
description: A ghost writer, hired to complete the memoirs of a former British Prime Minister, uncovers secrets that put his own life in jeopardy.

name: The Karate Kid
actors: Jackie Chan, Jaden Smith, Taraji P. Henson, Wenwen Han
description: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the boy embraces kung fu, taught to him by a master.

name: Date Night
actors: Steve Carell, Tina Fey, Mark Wahlberg, Taraji P. Henson
description: In New York City, a case of mistaken identity turns a bored married couple's attempt at a glamorous and romantic evening into something more thrilling and dangerous.

name: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
actors: Nicolas Cage, Jay Baruchel, Alfred Molina, Teresa Palmer
description: Master sorcerer Balthazar Blake must find and train Merlin's descendant to defeat dark sorceress Morgana la Fée.

name: Buried
actors: Ryan Reynolds, José Luis García Pérez, Robert Paterson, Stephen Tobolowsky
description: Paul is a U.S. truck driver working in Iraq. After an attack by a group of Iraqis he wakes to find he is buried alive inside a coffin. With only a lighter and a cell phone it's a race against time to escape this claustrophobic death trap.

name: The Last Airbender
actors: Noah Ringer, Nicola Peltz, Jackson Rathbone, Dev Patel
description: Follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must master all four elements and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water Tribes and the Earth Kingdom.

name: Never Let Me Go
actors: Keira Knightley, Carey Mulligan, Andrew Garfield, Izzy Meikle-Small
description: The lives of three friends, from their early school days into young adulthood, when the reality of the world they live in comes knocking.

name: Remember Me
actors: Robert Pattinson, Emilie de Ravin, Caitlyn Rund, Moisés Acevedo
description: A romantic drama centered on two new lovers: Tyler, whose parents have split in the wake of his brother's suicide, and Ally, who lives each day to the fullest since witnessing her mother's murder.

name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
actors: Ben Barnes, Skandar Keynes, Georgie Henley, Will Poulter
description: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to Narnia with their cousin Eustace where they meet up with Prince Caspian for a trip across the sea aboard the royal ship The Dawn Treader. Along the way they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors before reaching the edge of the world.

name: Dear John
actors: Channing Tatum, Amanda Seyfried, Richard Jenkins, Henry Thomas
description: A romantic drama about a soldier who falls for a conservative college student while he's home on leave.

name: Winter's Bone
actors: Jennifer Lawrence, John Hawkes, Garret Dillahunt, Isaiah Stone
description: An unflinching Ozark Mountain girl hacks through dangerous social terrain as she hunts down her drug-dealing father while trying to keep her family intact.

name: It's Kind of a Funny Story
actors: Keir Gilchrist, Zach Galifianakis, Emma Roberts, Dana DeVestern
description: A clinically depressed teenager gets a new start after he checks himself into an adult psychiatric ward.

name: Green Zone
actors: Matt Damon, Jason Isaacs, Greg Kinnear, Igal Naor
description: Discovering covert and faulty intelligence causes a U.S. Army officer to go rogue as he hunts for Weapons of Mass Destruction in an unstable region.

name: Incendies
actors: Lubna Azabal, Mélissa Désormeaux-Poulin, Maxim Gaudette, Mustafa Kamel
description: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

name: Devil
actors: Chris Messina, Caroline Dhavernas, Bokeem Woodbine, Logan Marshall-Green
description: A group of people are trapped in an elevator and the Devil is mysteriously amongst them.

name: The Kids Are All Right
actors: Annette Bening, Julianne Moore, Mark Ruffalo, Mia Wasikowska

name: She's Out of My League
actors: Jay Baruchel, Alice Eve, T.J. Miller, Mike Vogel
description: An average Joe meets the perfect woman, but his lack of confidence and the influence of his friends and family begin to pick away at the relationship.

name: Life as We Know It
actors: Katherine Heigl, Josh Duhamel, Josh Lucas, Alexis Clagett
description: Two single adults become caregivers to an orphaned girl when their mutual best friends die in an accident.

name: The Bounty Hunter
actors: Jennifer Aniston, Gerard Butler, Gio Perez, Joel Marsh Garland
description: A bounty hunter learns that his next target is his ex-wife, a reporter working on a murder cover-up. Soon after their reunion, the always-at-odds duo find themselves on a run-for-their-lives adventure.

name: From Paris with Love
actors: John Travolta, Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Kasia Smutniak, Richard Durden
description: In Paris, a young employee in the office of the US Ambassador hooks up with an American spy looking to stop a terrorist attack in the city.

name: Valentine's Day
actors: Julia Roberts, Jamie Foxx, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Alba
description: Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day.

name: Let Me In
actors: Kodi Smit-McPhee, Chloë Grace Moretz, Richard Jenkins, Cara Buono
description: A bullied young boy befriends a young female vampire who lives in secrecy with her guardian.

name: The Crazies
actors: Radha Mitchell, Timothy Olyphant, Danielle Panabaker, Joe Anderson
description: After a strange and insecure plane crash, an unusual toxic virus enters a quaint farming town. A young couple are quarantined, but they fight for survival along with help from a couple of people.

name: The Way Back
actors: Jim Sturgess, Ed Harris, Colin Farrell, Dragos Bucur
description: Siberian gulag escapees travel 4,000 miles by foot to freedom in India.

name: Little Fockers
actors: Ben Stiller, Teri Polo, Robert De Niro, Owen Wilson
description: Family-patriarch Jack Byrnes wants to appoint a successor. Does his son-in-law, the male nurse Greg Focker, have what it takes?

name: The Wolfman
actors: Benicio Del Toro, Anthony Hopkins, Emily Blunt, Simon Merrells
description: Upon his return to his ancestral homeland, an American man is bitten, and subsequently cursed by, a werewolf.

name: Repo Men
actors: Jude Law, Forest Whitaker, Alice Braga, Liev Schreiber
description: Set in the near future when artificial organs can be bought on credit, it revolves around a man who struggles to make the payments on a heart he has purchased. He must therefore go on the run before said ticker is repossessed.

name: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
actors: Shia LaBeouf, Michael Douglas, Carey Mulligan, Josh Brolin
description: Now out of prison but still disgraced by his peers, Gordon Gekko works his future son-in-law, an idealistic stock broker, when he sees an opportunity to take down a Wall Street enemy and rebuild his empire.

name: Faster
actors: Dwayne Johnson, Billy Bob Thornton, Maggie Grace, Mauricio Lopez
description: An ex-con gets on a series of apparently unrelated killings. He gets tracked by a veteran cop with secrets of his own and an egocentric hit man.

name: Ang-ma-reul bo-at-da
actors: Byung-Hun Lee, Min-sik Choi, Joon-Hyuk Lee, In-seo Kim
description: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

name: Paranormal Activity 2
actors: Katie Featherston, Micah Sloat, Molly Ephraim, David Bierend
description: After experiencing what they think are a series of "break-ins", a family sets up security cameras around their home, only to realize that the events unfolding before them are more sinister than they seem.

name: Legion
actors: Paul Bettany, Dennis Quaid, Charles S. Dutton, Lucas Black
description: When a group of strangers at a dusty roadside diner come under attack by demonic forces, their only chance for survival lies with an archangel named Michael, who informs a pregnant waitress that her unborn child is humanity's last hope.

name: Dinner for Schmucks
actors: Steve Carell, Paul Rudd, Stephanie Szostak, Zach Galifianakis
description: When he finds out that his work superiors host a dinner celebrating the idiocy of their guests, a rising executive questions it when he's invited, just as he befriends a man who would be the perfect guest.

name: My Name Is Khan
actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Sheetal Menon, Katie A. Keane
description: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President of the United States seriously and embarks on a cross-country journey.

name: The Switch
actors: Jennifer Aniston, Jason Bateman, Patrick Wilson, Jeff Goldblum

name: Hereafter
actors: Matt Damon, Cécile de France, Bryce Dallas Howard, Thierry Neuvic
description: A drama centered on three people - a blue-collar American, a French journalist and a London school boy - who are touched by death in different ways.

name: The American
actors: George Clooney, Paolo Bonacelli, Violante Placido, Irina Björklund
description: An assassin hides out in Italy for one last assignment.

name: Yip Man 2
actors: Donnie Yen, Xiaoming Huang, Sammo Kam-Bo Hung, Lynn Xiong
description: Centering on Ip Man's migration to Hong Kong in 1949 as he attempts to propagate his discipline of Wing Chun martial arts.

name: Letters to Juliet
actors: Amanda Seyfried, Gael García Bernal, Vanessa Redgrave, Marcia DeBonis

name: Leap Year
actors: Amy Adams, Matthew Goode, Adam Scott, John Lithgow
description: Anna Brady plans to travel to Dublin, Ireland to propose marriage to her boyfriend Jeremy on Leap Day, because, according to Irish tradition, a man who receives a marriage proposal on a leap day must accept it.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
actors: Jackie Earle Haley, Rooney Mara, Kyle Gallner, Katie Cassidy

actors: Mel Gibson, Ray Winstone, Danny Huston, Bojana Novakovic

name: Monsters

name: Skyline
actors: Eric Balfour, Donald Faison, Scottie Thompson, Brittany Daniel
description: Strange lights descend on the city of Los Angeles, drawing people outside like moths to a flame where an extraterrestrial force threatens to swallow the entire human population off the face of the Earth.

name: Beginners
actors: Ewan McGregor, Christopher Plummer, Mélanie Laurent, Goran Visnjic
description: A young man is rocked by two announcements from his elderly father: that he has terminal cancer and that he has a young male lover.

name: The Losers
actors: Idris Elba, Zoe Saldana, Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Chris Evans

name: Saw 3D
actors: Tobin Bell, Costas Mandylor, Betsy Russell, Cary Elwes

name: Killers

name: Cop Out

name: Piranha 3D
actors: Elisabeth Shue, Jerry O'Connell, Richard Dreyfuss, Ving Rhames

name: Unthinkable

name: Biutiful
actors: Javier Bardem, Maricel Álvarez, Hanaa Bouchaib, Guillermo Estrella

name: Submarine

name: Eat Pray Love

name: Tropa de Elite 2: O Inimigo Agora é Outro
actors: Wagner Moura, Irandhir Santos, André Ramiro, Milhem Cortaz
description: After a prison riot, former-Captain Nascimento, now a high ranking security officer in Rio de Janeiro, is swept into a bloody political dispute that involves government officials and paramilitary groups.

name: Flipped
actors: Madeline Carroll, Callan McAuliffe, Rebecca De Mornay, Anthony Edwards

name: The Last Song
actors: Miley Cyrus, Liam Hemsworth, Greg Kinnear, Bobby Coleman

name: Centurion
actors: Michael Fassbender, Dominic West, Olga Kurylenko, Andreas Wisniewski

name: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
actors: Jim Sturgess, Hugo Weaving, David Wenham, Emily Barclay
description: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new-found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.

name: Burlesque
actors: Cher, Christina Aguilera, Alan Cumming, Eric Dane

name: Super
actors: Rainn Wilson, Ellen Page, Liv Tyler, Kevin Bacon

name: Sex and the City 2

name: I Spit on Your Grave
actors: Sarah Butler, Jeff Branson, Andrew Howard, Daniel Franzese

name: Kari-gurashi no Arietti

name: Morning Glory
actors: Rachel McAdams, Harrison Ford, Diane Keaton, Noah Bean

name: Four Lions
actors: Will Adamsdale, Riz Ahmed, Adeel Akhtar, Arsher Ali

name: Trolljegeren
actors: Otto Jespersen, Robert Stoltenberg, Knut Nærum, Glenn Erland Tosterud
description: A group of students investigates a series of mysterious bear killings, but learns that there are much more dangerous things going on. They start to follow a mysterious hunter, learning that he is actually a troll hunter.

name: Frozen
actors: Shawn Ashmore, Emma Bell, Kevin Zegers, Ed Ackerman
description: Three skiers stranded on a chairlift are forced to make life-or-death choices, which prove more perilous than staying put and freezing to death.

name: The Debt
actors: Helen Mirren, Sam Worthington, Tom Wilkinson, Ciarán Hinds

name: Gulliver's Travels
actors: Jack Black, Emily Blunt, Jason Segel, Amanda Peet
description: Travel writer Lemuel Gulliver takes an assignment in Bermuda, but ends up on the island of Lilliput, where he towers over its tiny citizens.

name: Jûsan-nin no shikaku
actors: Kôji Yakusho, Takayuki Yamada, Yûsuke Iseya, Ikki Sawamura
description: A group of assassins come together for a suicide mission to kill an evil lord.

name: When in Rome
actors: Kristen Bell, Josh Duhamel, Anjelica Huston, Danny DeVito
description: Beth is a young, ambitious New Yorker who is completely unlucky in love. However, on a whirlwind trip to Rome, she impulsively steals some coins from a reputed fountain of love, and is then aggressively pursued by a band of suitors.

name: Charlie St. Cloud
actors: Zac Efron, Kim Basinger, Charlie Tahan, Amanda Crew
description: Charlie's brother, Sam, dies in a car crash that Charlie survives. Charlie is given the gift of seeing his dead brother and others who he has lost such as his friend who died in the military, but when the girl he falls in love with's life is at risk, he must choose between his girlfriend and his brother.

name: Ajeossi
actors: Won Bin, Sae-ron Kim, Tae-hoon Kim, Hee-won Kim
description: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

name: Going the Distance
actors: Drew Barrymore, Justin Long, Ron Livingston, Charlie Day
description: A romantic comedy centered on a guy and a gal who try to keep their love alive as they shuttle back and forth between New York and San Francisco to see one another.

name: Takers
actors: Chris Brown, Hayden Christensen, Matt Dillon, Michael Ealy
description: A group of bank robbers find their multi-million dollar plan interrupted by a hard-boiled detective.

name: Step Up 3D
actors: Sharni Vinson, Rick Malambri, Adam Sevani, Alyson Stoner
description: A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown.

name: Jonah Hex
actors: Josh Brolin, Megan Fox, John Malkovich, Michael Fassbender
description: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

name: Animal Kingdom
actors: James Frecheville, Guy Pearce, Joel Edgerton, Bryce Lindemann
description: A seventeen year-old navigates his survival amongst an explosive criminal family and the detective who thinks he can save him.

name: Srpski film
actors: Srdjan 'Zika' Todorovic, Sergej Trifunovic, Jelena Gavrilovic, Slobodan Bestic
description: An aging porn star agrees to participate in an "art film" in order to make a clean break from the business, only to discover that he has been drafted into making a pedophilia and necrophilia themed snuff film.

name: All Good Things
actors: Ryan Gosling, Kirsten Dunst, Frank Langella, Lily Rabe
description: Mr. David Marks was suspected but never tried for killing his wife Katie who disappeared in 1982, but the truth is eventually revealed.

name: Hesher
actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Devin Brochu, Natalie Portman, Rainn Wilson
description: A young boy has lost his mother and is losing touch with his father and the world around him. Then he meets Hesher who manages to make his life even more chaotic.

name: The Experiment
actors: Adrien Brody, Cam Gigandet, Forest Whitaker, Maggie Grace
description: 26 men are chosen to participate in the roles of guards and prisoners in a psychological study that ultimately spirals out of control.

name: You Again
actors: Kristen Bell, Odette Annable, Sigourney Weaver, Jamie Lee Curtis
description: When a young woman realizes her brother is about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school, she sets out to expose the fiancée's true colors.

name: The Back-up Plan
actors: Jennifer Lopez, Alex O'Loughlin, Michaela Watkins, Eric Christian Olsen
description: A woman conceives twins through artificial insemination, only to meet the man of her dreams on the very same day.

name: The Last Exorcism
actors: Patrick Fabian, Ashley Bell, Iris Bahr, Louis Herthum
