name: Everything Must Go
actors: Will Ferrell, Rebecca Hall, Christopher Jordan Wallace, Michael Peña
description: When an alcoholic relapses, causing him to lose his wife and his job, he holds a yard sale on his front lawn in an attempt to start over. A new neighbor might be the key to his return to form.

name: Rabbit Hole
actors: Nicole Kidman, Aaron Eckhart, Dianne Wiest, Miles Teller
description: Life for a happy couple is turned upside down after their young son dies in an accident.

name: Last Night
actors: Keira Knightley, Sam Worthington, Eva Mendes, Guillaume Canet
description: The story follows a married couple, apart for a night while the husband takes a business trip with a colleague to whom he's attracted. While he's resisting temptation, his wife encounters her past love.

name: London Boulevard
actors: Colin Farrell, Keira Knightley, Ray Winstone, David Thewlis
description: An ex-con with a reputation tries to go straight by working as a handy man for a reclusive actress but this is unfortunately not the wish of London's underground crime lord.

name: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark
actors: Katie Holmes, Guy Pearce, Bailee Madison, Bruce Gleeson
description: A young girl sent to live with her father and his new girlfriend believes that she has released creatures from a sealed ash pit in the basement of her new home.

name: Vampires Suck
actors: Jenn Proske, Matt Lanter, Diedrich Bader, Chris Riggi
description: A spoof of vampire-themed movies, where teenager Becca finds herself torn between two boys. As she and her friends wrestle with a number of different dramas, everything comes to a head at their prom.

name: Fair Game
actors: Naomi Watts, Sean Penn, Sonya Davison, Vanessa Chong
description: CIA operative Valerie Plame discovers her identity is allegedly leaked by the government as payback for an op-ed article her husband wrote criticizing the Bush administration.

name: The Runaways
actors: Kristen Stewart, Dakota Fanning, Michael Shannon, Stella Maeve
description: A coming-of-age biographical film about the 1970s teenage all-girl rock band The Runaways. The relationship between band members Cherie Currie and Joan Jett is also explored.

name: Death at a Funeral
actors: Chris Rock, Martin Lawrence, Keith David, Loretta Devine
description: A funeral ceremony turns into a debacle of exposed family secrets and misplaced bodies.

name: You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger
actors: Anthony Hopkins, Naomi Watts, Josh Brolin, Gemma Jones
description: Sally's parents' marriage breaks up when her father undergoes a mid-life crisis and impulsively weds a prostitute. Meanwhile, Sally's own marriage also begins to disintegrate.

name: The Company Men
actors: Ben Affleck, Chris Cooper, Tommy Lee Jones, Suzanne Rico
description: The story centers on a year in the life of three men trying to survive a round of corporate downsizing at a major company - and how that affects them, their families, and their communities.

name: Black Death
actors: Eddie Redmayne, Sean Bean, Carice van Houten, Kimberley Nixon

name: How Do You Know

name: Somewhere
actors: Stephen Dorff, Elle Fanning, Chris Pontius, Erin Wasson
description: After withdrawing to the Chateau Marmont, a passionless Hollywood actor reexamines his life when his eleven-year-old daughter surprises him with a visit.

name: MacGruber
actors: Will Forte, Kristen Wiig, Val Kilmer, Ryan Phillippe
description: Former special operative MacGruber is called back into action to take down his arch-enemy, Dieter Von Cunth, who's in possession of a nuclear warhead and bent on destroying Washington, D.C.

name: Conviction
actors: Hilary Swank, Sam Rockwell, Melissa Leo, Thomas D. Mahard
description: A working mother puts herself through law school in an effort to represent her brother, who has been wrongfully convicted of murder and has exhausted his chances to appeal his conviction through public defenders.

name: Trust
actors: Clive Owen, Catherine Keener, Liana Liberato, Jason Clarke
description: A teenage girl is targeted by an online sexual predator.

name: Stake Land
actors: Connor Paolo, Nick Damici, Kelly McGillis, Gregory Jones
description: In a world of vampires, an expert vampire hunter and his young protégé travel toward sanctuary.

name: Stone
actors: Edward Norton, Milla Jovovich, Robert De Niro, Frances Conroy
description: A convicted arsonist looks to manipulate a parole officer into a plan to secure his parole by placing his beautiful wife in the lawman's path.

name: Udaan
actors: Rajat Barmecha, Sanjay Gandhi, Ronit Roy, Manjot Singh

actors: Sam Riley, Alice Barrett, Gaby Hoffmann, Jason Statham
description: A naive young man assumes a dead man's identity and finds himself embroiled in an underground world of power, violence, and chance where men gamble behind closed doors on the lives of other men.

name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid

actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

name: The Hunger Games
actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth, Stanley Tucci
description: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games: a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.

name: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
actors: Martin Freeman, Ian McKellen, Richard Armitage, Andy Serkis
description: A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

name: Silver Linings Playbook
actors: Bradley Cooper, Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro, Jacki Weaver
description: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

name: Skyfall
actors: Daniel Craig, Javier Bardem, Naomie Harris, Judi Dench
description: Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

name: Prometheus
actors: Noomi Rapace, Logan Marshall-Green, Michael Fassbender, Charlize Theron
description: Following clues to the origin of mankind, a team finds a structure on a distant moon, but they soon realize they are not alone.

name: Ted
actors: Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis, Seth MacFarlane, Joel McHale
description: John Bennett, a man whose childhood wish of bringing his teddy bear to life came true, now must decide between keeping the relationship with the bear or his girlfriend, Lori.

name: Argo
actors: Ben Affleck, Bryan Cranston, John Goodman, Alan Arkin
description: Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.

name: Life of Pi
actors: Suraj Sharma, Irrfan Khan, Adil Hussain, Tabu
description: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man
actors: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Rhys Ifans, Irrfan Khan
description: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to solve the mystery of his parent's mysterious death.

name: Looper
actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Bruce Willis, Emily Blunt, Paul Dano
description: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.

name: 21 Jump Street
actors: Jonah Hill, Channing Tatum, Ice Cube, Brie Larson
description: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

name: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
actors: Logan Lerman, Emma Watson, Ezra Miller, Paul Rudd
description: An introvert freshman is taken under the wings of two seniors who welcome him to the real world.

name: Wreck-It Ralph
actors: John C. Reilly, Jack McBrayer, Jane Lynch, Sarah Silverman
description: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

name: Brave
directors: Mark Andrews, Brenda Chapman, Steve Purcell
actors: Kelly Macdonald, Billy Connolly, Emma Thompson, Julie Walters
description: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

name: Cloud Atlas
directors: Tom Tykwer, Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski
actors: Tom Hanks, Halle Berry, Hugh Grant, Hugo Weaving
description: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.

name: Men in Black 3
actors: Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Josh Brolin, Jemaine Clement
description: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.

name: Flight
actors: Denzel Washington, Nadine Velazquez, Don Cheadle, John Goodman
description: An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling.

name: Moonrise Kingdom
actors: Jared Gilman, Kara Hayward, Bruce Willis, Bill Murray
description: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out to find them.

name: Les Misérables
actors: Hugh Jackman, Russell Crowe, Anne Hathaway, Amanda Seyfried
description: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

name: Jack Reacher
actors: Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Richard Jenkins, Werner Herzog
description: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

name: The Expendables 2
actors: Sylvester Stallone, Liam Hemsworth, Randy Couture, Jean-Claude Van Damme
description: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.

name: Taken 2
actors: Liam Neeson, Famke Janssen, Maggie Grace, Leland Orser
description: In Istanbul, retired CIA operative Bryan Mills and his wife are taken hostage by the father of a kidnapper Mills killed while rescuing his daughter.

name: The Bourne Legacy
actors: Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz, Edward Norton, Scott Glenn

name: Snow White and the Huntsman

name: Pitch Perfect

name: The Dictator
actors: Sacha Baron Cohen, Anna Faris, John C. Reilly, Ben Kingsley
description: The heroic story of a dictator who risked his life to ensure that democracy would never come to the country he so lovingly oppressed.

name: Zero Dark Thirty

name: Jagten
actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen, Annika Wedderkopp, Lasse Fogelstrøm
description: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

name: Dredd

name: Chronicle
actors: Dane DeHaan, Alex Russell, Michael B. Jordan, Michael Kelly

name: Dark Shadows
actors: Johnny Depp, Michelle Pfeiffer, Eva Green, Helena Bonham Carter

name: Lincoln
actors: Daniel Day-Lewis, Sally Field, David Strathairn, Joseph Gordon-Levitt

name: The Place Beyond the Pines
actors: Ryan Gosling, Bradley Cooper, Eva Mendes, Craig Van Hook

name: Battleship
actors: Alexander Skarsgård, Brooklyn Decker, Liam Neeson, Rihanna
description: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

name: Seven Psychopaths
actors: Colin Farrell, Woody Harrelson, Sam Rockwell, Christopher Walken

name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2

description: After the birth of Renesmee/Nessie, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

name: Lawless
actors: Tom Hardy, Shia LaBeouf, Guy Pearce, Jason Clarke
description: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a trio of bootlegging brothers are threatened by a new special deputy and other authorities angling for a cut of their profits.

name: Hotel Transylvania
actors: Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez
description: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.

name: Sinister

name: Safe House
actors: Denzel Washington, Ryan Reynolds, Robert Patrick, Vera Farmiga
description: A young CIA agent is tasked with looking after a fugitive in a safe house. But when the safe house is attacked, he finds himself on the run with his charge.

name: American Reunion
actors: Jason Biggs, Alyson Hannigan, Seann William Scott, Chris Klein
description: Jim, Michelle, Stifler, and their friends reunite in East Great Falls, Michigan for their high school reunion.

name: Project X
actors: Thomas Mann, Oliver Cooper, Jonathan Daniel Brown, Dax Flame

name: Lo imposible
actors: Naomi Watts, Ewan McGregor, Tom Holland, Oaklee Pendergast

name: Ice Age: Continental Drift
actors: Ray Romano, Denis Leary, John Leguizamo, Aziz Ansari

name: The Vow
actors: Rachel McAdams, Channing Tatum, Sam Neill, Jessica Lange

name: Wrath of the Titans
actors: Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Rosamund Pike, Ralph Fiennes
description: Perseus braves the treacherous underworld to rescue his father, Zeus, captured by his son, Ares, and brother Hades who unleash the ancient Titans upon the world.

name: This Means War
actors: Reese Witherspoon, Chris Pine, Tom Hardy, Til Schweiger
description: A pair of C.I.A. operatives wage an epic battle against one another when they discover they are dating the same woman.

name: The Woman in Black
actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Janet McTeer, Ciarán Hinds, Emma Shorey

name: Mud
actors: Matthew McConaughey, Tye Sheridan, Jacob Lofland, Sam Shepard
description: Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.

name: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
directors: Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath, Conrad Vernon
actors: Ben Stiller, Jada Pinkett Smith, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer
description: The Madagascar animals join a struggling European circus to get back to New York, but find themselves being pursued by a psychotic animal control officer.

name: Rise of the Guardians
actors: Hugh Jackman, Alec Baldwin, Isla Fisher, Chris Pine

name: Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter
actors: Benjamin Walker, Rufus Sewell, Dominic Cooper, Anthony Mackie

name: Underworld Awakening
actors: Kate Beckinsale, Michael Ealy, India Eisley, Stephen Rea
description: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind.

actors: Sam Worthington, Elizabeth Banks, Jamie Bell, Mandy Gonzalez

actors: Philip Seymour Hoffman, Joaquin Phoenix, Amy Adams, Jesse Plemons

name: Resident Evil: Retribution
actors: Milla Jovovich, Sienna Guillory, Michelle Rodriguez, Aryana Engineer

name: Killing Them Softly
actors: Brad Pitt, Ray Liotta, Richard Jenkins, Scoot McNairy

name: Magic Mike
actors: Channing Tatum, Alex Pettyfer, Olivia Munn, Matthew McConaughey

name: The Campaign
actors: Will Ferrell, Zach Galifianakis, Jason Sudeikis, Dylan McDermott

name: The Watch

name: Savages

name: Safety Not Guaranteed
actors: Aubrey Plaza, Mark Duplass, Jake Johnson, Karan Soni

name: Contraband
actors: Mark Wahlberg, Giovanni Ribisi, Kate Beckinsale, Robert Wahlberg

name: Premium Rush

name: Frankenweenie
actors: Winona Ryder, Catherine O'Hara, Martin Short, Martin Landau

name: The Five-Year Engagement
actors: Jason Segel, Emily Blunt, Chris Pratt, Alison Brie

name: Iron Sky
actors: Julia Dietze, Christopher Kirby, Götz Otto, Udo Kier

name: ParaNorman
actors: Kodi Smit-McPhee, Anna Kendrick, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, Tucker Albrizzi
description: A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.

name: Amour

description: When a madman begins committing horrific murders inspired by Edgar Allan Poe's works, a young Baltimore detective joins forces with Poe to stop him from making his stories a reality.

name: Mirror Mirror
actors: Lily Collins, Julia Roberts, Armie Hammer, Nathan Lane

name: To Rome with Love
actors: Woody Allen, Penélope Cruz, Jesse Eisenberg, Ellen Page

name: Stuck in Love
actors: Greg Kinnear, Jennifer Connelly, Lily Collins, Nat Wolff

name: Beasts of the Southern Wild

name: The Words
actors: Bradley Cooper, Dennis Quaid, Olivia Wilde, Zoe Saldana
description: A writer at the peak of his literary success discovers the steep price he must pay for stealing another man's work.

name: Disconnect
actors: Jason Bateman, Jonah Bobo, Haley Ramm, Hope Davis
description: A drama centered on a group of people searching for human connections in today's wired world.

name: Rock of Ages
actors: Julianne Hough, Diego Boneta, Tom Cruise, Alec Baldwin
description: A small town girl and a city boy meet on the Sunset Strip while pursuing their Hollywood dreams.

name: Red Dawn
actors: Chris Hemsworth, Isabel Lucas, Josh Hutcherson, Josh Peck
description: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

name: Wanderlust
actors: Jennifer Aniston, Paul Rudd, Malin Akerman, Justin Theroux
description: Rattled by sudden unemployment, a Manhattan couple surveys alternative living options, ultimately deciding to experiment with living on a rural commune where free love rules.

name: Barfi!
actors: Ranbir Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra, Ileana D'Cruz, Saurabh Shukla

name: Gangs of Wasseypur

name: Hitchcock
actors: Anthony Hopkins, Helen Mirren, Scarlett Johansson, Danny Huston

name: Upside Down

actors: Cameron Diaz, Matthew Morrison, J. Todd Smith, Dennis Quaid

name: The Iceman
actors: Michael Shannon, Chris Evans, James Franco, Winona Ryder

name: Act of Valor
actors: Alex Veadov, Roselyn Sanchez, Nestor Serrano, Rorke Denver
description: An elite team of Navy SEALs embark on a covert mission to recover a kidnapped CIA agent.

name: The First Time
actors: Dylan O'Brien, Britt Robertson, Victoria Justice, James Frecheville
description: A shy senior and a down-to-earth junior fall in love over one weekend.

name: Chernobyl Diaries
actors: Jesse McCartney, Jonathan Sadowski, Olivia Taylor Dudley, Nathan Phillips
description: Six tourists hire an extreme tour guide who takes them to the abandoned city Pripyat, the former home to the workers of the Chernobyl nuclear reactor. During their exploration, they soon discover they are not alone.

name: Frances Ha

description: A New York woman (who doesn't really have an apartment) apprentices for a dance company (though she's not really a dancer) and throws herself headlong into her dreams, even as the possibility of realizing them dwindles.

name: Robot & Frank

name: The Man with the Iron Fists

description: It has been five years since the disappearance of Katie and Hunter, and a suburban family witness strange events in their neighborhood when a woman and a mysterious child move in.

name: Silent Hill: Revelation
actors: Adelaide Clemens, Kit Harington, Sean Bean, Carrie-Anne Moss
description: When her adoptive father disappears, Sharon Da Silva is drawn into a strange and terrifying alternate reality that holds answers to the horrific nightmares that have plagued her since childhood.

name: Trouble with the Curve
actors: Clint Eastwood, Amy Adams, John Goodman, Justin Timberlake

name: Red Lights
actors: Sigourney Weaver, Robert De Niro, Cillian Murphy, Elizabeth Olsen

name: Fetih 1453

description: After the death of his father Murat II, Mehmet II ascends to the Ottoman throne. After braving internal and external enemies, he decides to complete what he was destined to do - conquer Constantinople.

name: The Possession

name: V/H/S
directors: Matt Bettinelli-Olpin, David Bruckner, Tyler Gillett, Justin Martinez, Glenn McQuaid, Radio Silence, Joe Swanberg, Chad Villella, Ti West, Adam Wingard
actors: Calvin Reeder, Lane Hughes, Adam Wingard, Hannah Fierman

description: A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.

name: Ender's Game

description: Young Ender Wiggin is recruited by the International Military to lead the fight against the Formics, an insectoid alien race who had previously tried to invade Earth and had inflicted heavy losses on humankind.

name: Escape Plan
actors: Sylvester Stallone, Arnold Schwarzenegger, 50 Cent, Vincent D'Onofrio
description: When a structural-security authority finds himself set up and incarcerated in the world's most secret and secure prison, he has to use his skills to escape with help from the inside.

name: The Lone Ranger
actors: Johnny Depp, Armie Hammer, William Fichtner, Tom Wilkinson

name: Gangster Squad

name: Oz the Great and Powerful

name: Pain & Gain

name: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters

description: Hansel & Gretel are bounty hunters who track and kill witches all over the world. As the fabled Blood Moon approaches, the siblings encounter a new form of evil that might hold a secret to their past.

name: 2 Guns

name: After Earth

name: Blue Jasmine

name: The Croods
actors: Nicolas Cage, Ryan Reynolds, Emma Stone, Catherine Keener

name: Side Effects
actors: Rooney Mara, Channing Tatum, Jude Law, Catherine Zeta-Jones

name: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
actors: Dwayne Johnson, Channing Tatum, Adrianne Palicki, Byung-Hun Lee

name: Mama

name: The Heat

name: RED 2
actors: Bruce Willis, Helen Mirren, John Malkovich, Anthony Hopkins

name: Evil Dead

actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Mélanie Laurent, Sarah Gadon, Isabella Rossellini

name: Insidious: Chapter 2

actors: Keanu Reeves, Hiroyuki Sanada, Ko Shibasaki, Tadanobu Asano

name: The Spectacular Now

name: Oculus

actors: Emma Stone, Stephen Merchant, Richard Gere, Liev Schreiber

name: Jobs

actors: Chadwick Boseman, T.R. Knight, Harrison Ford, Nicole Beharie

name: Queen

name: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag

name: Grudge Match

name: The Big Wedding

name: 99 Homes
actors: Andrew Garfield, Michael Shannon, Laura Dern, Clancy Brown

name: A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night
actors: Sheila Vand, Arash Marandi, Marshall Manesh, Mozhan Marnò
description: In the Iranian ghost-town Bad City, a place that reeks of death and loneliness, the townspeople are unaware they are being stalked by a lonesome vampire.

name: La isla mínima

description: In the MARSHLAND a serial killer is on the loose. Two homicide detectives who appear to be poles apart must settle their differences and bring the murderer to justice before more young women lose their lives.

name: White Bird in a Blizzard
actors: Shailene Woodley, Eva Green, Christopher Meloni, Angela Bassett
description: In 1988, a teenage girl's life is thrown into chaos when her mother disappears.

name: X+Y
actors: Asa Butterfield, Rafe Spall, Sally Hawkins, Eddie Marsan

name: The Good Lie

name: Top Five
actors: Chris Rock, Rosario Dawson, Gabrielle Union, Kevin Hart

name: Clouds of Sils Maria
actors: Juliette Binoche, Kristen Stewart, Chloë Grace Moretz, Lars Eidinger

name: The Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death

name: Heaven Is for Real
actors: Greg Kinnear, Kelly Reilly, Thomas Haden Church, Connor Corum

name: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens

description: Three decades after the Empire's defeat, a new threat arises in the militant First Order. Stormtrooper defector Finn and the scavenger Rey are caught up in the Resistance's search for the missing Luke Skywalker.

name: Mad Max: Fury Road

description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

name: The Martian

description: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

description: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.

name: The Revenant
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hardy, Will Poulter, Domhnall Gleeson
description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

name: Jurassic World
actors: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Ty Simpkins, Judy Greer
description: A new theme park, built on the original site of Jurassic Park, creates a genetically modified hybrid dinosaur, the Indominus Rex, which escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.

name: Inside Out

name: Ant-Man

name: The Hateful Eight
actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Walton Goggins

name: Spotlight
actors: Mark Ruffalo, Michael Keaton, Rachel McAdams, Liev Schreiber

name: Spectre
actors: Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Léa Seydoux, Ralph Fiennes
description: A cryptic message from 007's past sends him pitted against a mysterious terrorist organization called Spectre, and learns of its involvement in previous events of his most dangerous missions.

name: Furious Seven
actors: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham

name: Sicario
actors: Emily Blunt, Josh Brolin, Benicio Del Toro, Jon Bernthal

name: Room
actors: Brie Larson, Jacob Tremblay, Sean Bridgers, Wendy Crewson
description: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

name: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
actors: Tom Cruise, Rebecca Ferguson, Jeremy Renner, Simon Pegg
description: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

name: The Big Short
actors: Christian Bale, Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling, Brad Pitt

name: Fifty Shades of Grey
actors: Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan, Jennifer Ehle, Eloise Mumford

name: Bridge of Spies
actors: Tom Hanks, Mark Rylance, Alan Alda, Amy Ryan

name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth, Woody Harrelson

name: Terminator Genisys
actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jason Clarke, Emilia Clarke, Jai Courtney

name: Creed
actors: Michael B. Jordan, Sylvester Stallone, Tessa Thompson, Phylicia Rashad

name: Spy
actors: Melissa McCarthy, Rose Byrne, Jude Law, Jason Statham

name: Chappie
actors: Sharlto Copley, Dev Patel, Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver
description: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.

name: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
actors: Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario, Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Giancarlo Esposito
description: After having escaped the Maze, the Gladers now face a new set of challenges on the open roads of a desolate landscape filled with unimaginable obstacles.

actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Rachel McAdams, Oona Laurence, Forest Whitaker

name: Insurgent
actors: Shailene Woodley, Ansel Elgort, Theo James, Kate Winslet
description: Beatrice Prior must confront her inner demons and continue her fight against a powerful alliance which threatens to tear her society apart with the help from others on her side.

name: Minions
actors: Sandra Bullock, Jon Hamm, Michael Keaton, Pierre Coffin

name: San Andreas
actors: Dwayne Johnson, Carla Gugino, Alexandra Daddario, Colton Haynes
description: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.

name: Focus
actors: Will Smith, Margot Robbie, Rodrigo Santoro, Adrian Martinez

name: The Intern

actors: Jason Clarke, Ang Phula Sherpa, Thomas M. Wright, Martin Henderson

name: Jupiter Ascending

name: Tomorrowland

name: Black Mass

name: The VVitch: A New-England Folktale

description: A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic and possession.

name: The Danish Girl
actors: Eddie Redmayne, Alicia Vikander, Amber Heard, Ben Whishaw

name: Cinderella

name: Legend
actors: Tom Hardy, Emily Browning, Taron Egerton, Paul Anderson

name: Pitch Perfect 2
actors: Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson, Hailee Steinfeld, Brittany Snow

name: The Gift
actors: Jason Bateman, Rebecca Hall, Joel Edgerton, Allison Tolman

name: Trainwreck
actors: Amy Schumer, Bill Hader, Brie Larson, Colin Quinn

name: Pixels
actors: Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Michelle Monaghan, Peter Dinklage

name: Joy

actors: Will Ferrell, Kevin Hart, Alison Brie, T.I.

actors: Chris Hemsworth, Cillian Murphy, Brendan Gleeson, Ben Whishaw

name: The Visit
actors: Olivia DeJonge, Ed Oxenbould, Deanna Dunagan, Peter McRobbie

name: Carol
actors: Cate Blanchett, Rooney Mara, Sarah Paulson, Kyle Chandler

name: Bahubali: The Beginning
actors: Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Ramya Krishnan, Sathyaraj

actors: Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez, Kevin James

name: The Good Dinosaur
actors: Jeffrey Wright, Frances McDormand, Maleah Nipay-Padilla, Ryan Teeple

name: Green Room
actors: Anton Yelchin, Imogen Poots, Alia Shawkat, Patrick Stewart

name: Home
actors: Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin, Jennifer Lopez

name: The Last Witch Hunter
actors: Vin Diesel, Rose Leslie, Elijah Wood, Ólafur Darri Ólafsson

name: Self/less

name: Hitman: Agent 47

actors: Sharlto Copley, Tim Roth, Haley Bennett, Danila Kozlovsky

name: The Duff

name: Goosebumps
actors: Jack Black, Dylan Minnette, Odeya Rush, Ryan Lee

name: Entourage
actors: Adrian Grenier, Kevin Connolly, Jerry Ferrara, Kevin Dillon

name: Project Almanac
actors: Amy Landecker, Sofia Black-D'Elia, Virginia Gardner, Jonny Weston

name: The Longest Ride
actors: Scott Eastwood, Britt Robertson, Alan Alda, Jack Huston

name: No Escape
actors: Lake Bell, Pierce Brosnan, Owen Wilson, Thanawut Ketsaro

name: Trumbo
actors: Bryan Cranston, Diane Lane, Helen Mirren, Louis C.K.

name: The Invitation
actors: Logan Marshall-Green, Emayatzy Corinealdi, Michiel Huisman, Tammy Blanchard
description: A man accepts an invitation to a dinner party hosted by his ex-wife, an unsettling affair that reopens old wounds and creates new tensions.

name: Bone Tomahawk
actors: Kurt Russell, Patrick Wilson, Matthew Fox, Richard Jenkins

name: Knock Knock
actors: Keanu Reeves, Lorenza Izzo, Ana de Armas, Aaron Burns

name: The Wedding Ringer
actors: Kevin Hart, Josh Gad, Kaley Cuoco, Affion Crockett

name: Youth
actors: Michael Caine, Harvey Keitel, Rachel Weisz, Jane Fonda

name: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
actors: Salman Khan, Harshaali Malhotra, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Kareena Kapoor
description: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.

name: Beasts of No Nation
actors: Abraham Attah, Emmanuel Affadzi, Ricky Adelayitor, Andrew Adote

name: Mortdecai
actors: Johnny Depp, Gwyneth Paltrow, Ewan McGregor, Olivia Munn

name: Child 44
actors: Tom Hardy, Gary Oldman, Noomi Rapace, Joel Kinnaman

name: Sisters
actors: Amy Poehler, Tina Fey, Maya Rudolph, Ike Barinholtz
description: Two sisters decide to throw one last house party before their parents sell their family home.

name: The Night Before
actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Seth Rogen, Jillian Bell, Lizzy Caplan

name: Mr. Holmes
actors: Ian McKellen, Laura Linney, Hiroyuki Sanada, Hattie Morahan
description: An aged, retired Sherlock Holmes deals with early dementia, as he tries to remember his final case, and a mysterious woman, whose memory haunts him. He also befriends a fan, the young son of his housekeeper, who wants him to work again.

name: Anomalisa
actors: David Thewlis, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Tom Noonan
description: A man crippled by the mundanity of his life experiences something out of the ordinary.

name: Pan
actors: Levi Miller, Hugh Jackman, Garrett Hedlund, Rooney Mara

name: Krampus
actors: Adam Scott, Toni Collette, David Koechner, Allison Tolman

name: Aloha
actors: Bradley Cooper, Rachel McAdams, Emma Stone, Alec Baldwin

name: Drishyam
actors: Ajay Devgn, Shriya Saran, Tabu, Rajat Kapoor

name: Point Break
actors: Edgar Ramírez, Luke Bracey, Ray Winstone, Teresa Palmer

name: Poltergeist
actors: Sam Rockwell, Rosemarie DeWitt, Kennedi Clements, Saxon Sharbino

name: True Story
actors: James Franco, Jonah Hill, Felicity Jones, Maria Dizzia

name: Irrational Man
actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone, Parker Posey, Joe Stapleton

name: Le Petit Prince

With the fate of the world at stake, good and evil will collide in the ultimate battle, as only Roland can defend the Tower from the Man in Black.

name: Hold the Dark
actors: Jeffrey Wright, Alexander Skarsgård, James Badge Dale, Riley Keough
description: After the deaths of three children suspected to be killed by wolves, writer Russell Core is hired by the parents of a missing six-year-old boy to track down and locate their son in the Alaskan wilderness.

name: Beautiful Boy
actors: Steve Carell, Maura Tierney, Jack Dylan Grazer, Oakley Bull
description: Based on the best-selling pair of memoirs from father and son David and Nic Sheff, Beautiful Boy chronicles the heartbreaking and inspiring experience of survival, relapse, and recovery in a family coping with addiction over many years.

name: Arif V 216
actors: Cem Yilmaz, Ozan Güven, Özkan Ugur, Özge Özberk
description: After 8 years, Arif's old friend 216 from planet GORA pays a visit to Earth.Together they go on a quest where they'll be visiting 60's.

name: Mute
actors: Alexander Skarsgård, Paul Rudd, Justin Theroux, Levi Eisenblätter
description: A mute bartender goes up against his city's gangsters in an effort to find out what happened to his missing partner.

name: Sierra Burgess Is a Loser
actors: Shannon Purser, Kristine Froseth, RJ Cyler, Noah Centineo
description: A case of mistaken identity results in unexpected romance when the most popular girl in high school and the biggest loser must come together to win over their crushes.

name: The Open House
actors: Dylan Minnette, Piercey Dalton, Patricia Bethune, Sharif Atkins
description: A teenager and his mother find themselves besieged by threatening forces when they move into a new house.

name: Les Frères Sisters
actors: John C. Reilly, Joaquin Phoenix, Jake Gyllenhaal, Riz Ahmed
description: In 1850s Oregon, a gold prospector is chased by the infamous duo of assassins, the Sisters brothers.

name: Life of the Party
actors: Melissa McCarthy, Matt Walsh, Molly Gordon, Ben Falcone
description: After her husband abruptly asks for a divorce, a middle-aged mother returns to college in order to complete her degree.

name: The Titan
actors: Sam Worthington, Taylor Schilling, Tom Wilkinson, Agyness Deyn
description: A military family takes part in a ground-breaking experiment of genetic evolution and space exploration.

name: Overboard
actors: Eugenio Derbez, Anna Faris, Eva Longoria, John Hannah
description: After a spoiled, wealthy yacht owner is thrown overboard and loses his memory, a mistreated employee convinces him that he is her working-class husband.

name: Winchester
actors: Helen Mirren, Sarah Snook, Finn Scicluna-O'Prey, Jason Clarke
description: Ensconced in her sprawling California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle.

name: The Mule
actors: Bradley Cooper, Manny Montana, Clint Eastwood, Taissa Farmiga
description: A 90-years-old horticulturist and Korean War veteran turns in a drug mail for a Mexican cartel.

name: Nada a Perder
actors: Petrônio Gontijo, Day Mesquita, Beth Goulart, Dalton Vigh
description: Self-financed fictional biopic of Brazilian evangelical bishop Edir Macedo, founder of the Universal Church of the Kingdom of God and owner of Record TV network.

name: Padmaavat
actors: Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh, Shahid Kapoor, Aditi Rao Hydari
description: Set in medieval Rajasthan, Queen Padmavati is married to a noble king and they live in a prosperous fortress with their subjects until an ambitious Sultan hears of Padmavati's beauty and forms an obsessive love for the Queen of Mewar.

name: The Girl in the Spider's Web
actors: Claire Foy, Beau Gadsdon, Sverrir Gudnason, LaKeith Stanfield
description: Young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander and journalist Mikael Blomkvist find themselves caught in a web of spies, cybercriminals and corrupt government officials.

name: Braven
actors: Jason Momoa, Garret Dillahunt, Jill Wagner, Stephen Lang
description: A logger defends his family from a group of dangerous drug runners.

name: Manbiki kazoku
actors: Lily Franky, Sakura Andô, Kirin Kiki, Mayu Matsuoka
description: A family of small-time crooks take in a child they find outside in the cold.

name: Can You Ever Forgive Me?
actors: Melissa McCarthy, Richard E. Grant, Dolly Wells, Ben Falcone
description: When Lee Israel falls out of step with current tastes, she turns her art form to deception.

name: K.G.F: Chapter 1
actors: Yash, Srinidhi Shetty, Ramachandra Raju, Archana Jois
description: Set in the 1970s, it's the story of a fierce rebel who rises against the brutal oppression and becomes the symbol of hope to legions of downtrodden people.

name: The Old Man & the Gun
actors: Robert Redford, Casey Affleck, Sissy Spacek, Danny Glover
description: Based on the true story of Forrest Tucker and his audacious escape from San Quentin at the age of 70 to an unprecedented string of heists that confounded authorities and enchanted the public.

name: Game Over, Man!
actors: Adam Devine, Anders Holm, Blake Anderson, Chloe Bridges
description: Three friends are on the verge of getting their video game financed when their benefactor is taken hostage by terrorists.

name: The 15:17 to Paris
actors: Alek Skarlatos, Anthony Sadler, Spencer Stone, Ray Corasani
description: Americans discover a terrorist plot on a Paris-bound train.

name: The Strangers: Prey at Night
actors: Christina Hendricks, Martin Henderson, Bailee Madison, Lewis Pullman
description: A family of four staying at a secluded mobile home park for the night are stalked and then hunted by three masked psychopaths.

name: The Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society
actors: Jessica Brown Findlay, Tom Courtenay, Michiel Huisman, Katherine Parkinson
description: In the aftermath of World War II, a writer forms an unexpected bond with the residents of Guernsey Island when she decides to write a book about their experiences during the war.

name: Smallfoot
actors: Channing Tatum, James Corden, Zendaya, Common
description: A Yeti is convinced that the elusive creatures known as "humans" really do exist.

name: Gringo
actors: Joel Edgerton, Charlize Theron, David Oyelowo, Thandie Newton
description: GRINGO, a dark comedy mixed with white-knuckle action and dramatic intrigue, explores the battle of survival for businessman Harold Soyinka (David Oyelowo) when he finds himself crossing the line from law-abiding citizen to wanted criminal.

name: Den skyldige
actors: Jakob Cedergren, Jessica Dinnage, Omar Shargawi, Johan Olsen
description: A police officer assigned alarm dispatch duty enters a race against time when he answers an emergency call from a kidnapped woman.

name: Night School
actors: Kevin Hart, Tiffany Haddish, Rob Riggle, Romany Malco
description: A group of high school dropouts are forced to attend night school in hope that they'll pass the GED exam to finish high school.

name: Summer of 84
directors: François Simard, Anouk Whissell, Yoann-Karl Whissell
actors: Graham Verchere, Judah Lewis, Caleb Emery, Cory Gruter-Andrew
description: After suspecting that their police officer neighbor is a serial killer, a group of teenage friends spend their summer spying on him and gathering evidence, but as they get closer to discovering the truth, things get dangerous.

name: Tau
actors: Maika Monroe, Ed Skrein, Gary Oldman, Fiston Barek
description: A woman is held captive by a scientist in a futuristic smart house, and hopes to escape by reasoning with the Artificial Intelligence that controls the house.

name: Escape Plan 2: Hades
actors: Sylvester Stallone, Dave Bautista, Xiaoming Huang, Jesse Metcalfe
description: Years after he fought his way out of an inescapable prison, Ray Breslin has organized a new top-notch security force. But when one of his team members goes missing, Breslin must return to the hell he once escaped from.

name: The Darkest Minds
actors: Amandla Stenberg, Mandy Moore, Bradley Whitford, Harris Dickinson
description: Imprisoned by an adult world that now fears everyone under 18, a group of teens form a resistance group to fight back and reclaim control of their future.

name: Operation Finale
actors: Oscar Isaac, Ben Kingsley, Mélanie Laurent, Lior Raz
description: A team of secret agents set out to track down the Nazi officer who masterminded the Holocaust.

name: Zero
actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Anushka Sharma, Katrina Kaif, Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub
description: The story revolves around Bauua Singh (Shah Rukh Khan), a vertically challenged man, who is full of charm and wit, with a pinch of arrogance. Born to a wealthy family and raised in an environment of affluence, he is challenged to broaden his horizon and find purpose in life.

name: Super Troopers 2
actors: Jay Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, Steve Lemme, Paul Soter
description: When a border dispute arises between the U.S. and Canada, the Super Troopers are tasked with establishing a Highway Patrol station in the disputed area.

name: 22 July
actors: Anders Danielsen Lie, Jonas Strand Gravli, Jon Øigarden, Maria Bock
description: A three-part story of Norway's worst terrorist attack in which over seventy people were killed. 22 July looks at the disaster itself, the survivors, Norway's political system and the lawyers who worked on this horrific case.

name: Stree
actors: Rajkummar Rao, Shraddha Kapoor, Pankaj Tripathi, Aparshakti Khurana
description: In the small town of Chanderi, the menfolk live in fear of an evil spirit named "Stree" who abducts men in the night. Based on the urban legend of "Nale Ba" that went viral in Karnataka in the 1990s.

name: Mary Queen of Scots
actors: Saoirse Ronan, Margot Robbie, Jack Lowden, Joe Alwyn
description: Mary Stuart's attempt to overthrow her cousin Elizabeth I, Queen of England, finds her condemned to years of imprisonment before facing execution.

name: Slender Man
actors: Joey King, Julia Goldani Telles, Jaz Sinclair, Annalise Basso
description: In a small town in Massachusetts, a group of friends, fascinated by the internet lore of the Slender Man, attempt to prove that he doesn't actually exist - until one of them mysteriously goes missing.

name: Climax
actors: Sofia Boutella, Romain Guillermic, Souheila Yacoub, Kiddy Smile
description: French dancers gather in a remote, empty school building to rehearse on a wintry night. The all-night celebration morphs into a hallucinatory nightmare when they learn their sangria is laced with LSD.

name: Book Club
actors: Diane Keaton, Jane Fonda, Candice Bergen, Mary Steenburgen
description: Four lifelong friends have their lives forever changed after reading 50 Shades of Grey in their monthly book club.

name: If Beale Street Could Talk
actors: KiKi Layne, Stephan James, Regina King, Colman Domingo
description: A woman in Harlem embraces her pregnancy while she and her family struggle to prove her fiancé innocent of a crime.

name: Raazi
actors: Alia Bhatt, Vicky Kaushal, Rajit Kapoor, Shishir Sharma
description: A Kashmiri woman agrees to marry a Pakistani army officer in order to spy on Pakistan during the Indo-Pakistan War of 1971.

name: Dumplin'
actors: Danielle Macdonald, Jennifer Aniston, Odeya Rush, Maddie Baillio
description: Willowdean ('Dumplin'), the plus-size teenage daughter of a former beauty queen, signs up for her mom's Miss Teen Bluebonnet pageant as a protest that escalates when other contestants follow her footsteps, revolutionizing the pageant and their small Texas town.

name: Beoning
actors: Ah-in Yoo, Steven Yeun, Jong-seo Jun, Soo-Kyung Kim
description: Jong-su bumps into a girl who used to live in the same neighborhood as him, who asks him to look after her cat while on a trip to Africa. When back, she introduces Ben, a mysterious guy she met there, who confesses his secret hobby.

name: Traffik
actors: Priscilla Quintana, Luke Goss, Paula Patton, William Fichtner
description: A couple off for a romantic weekend in the mountains are accosted by a biker gang. Alone in the mountains, Brea and John must defend themselves against the gang, who will stop at nothing to protect their secrets.

name: Badhaai Ho
actors: Ayushmann Khurrana, Sanya Malhotra, Neena Gupta, Gajraj Rao
description: A man faces embarrassment in the society when he finds out his mother is pregnant

name: Ghostland
actors: Crystal Reed, Mylène Farmer, Anastasia Phillips, Emilia Jones
description: A mother of two who inherits a house is confronted with murderous intruders on the first night in their new home and fights for her daughters' lives. Sixteen years later when the daughters reunite at the house, things get really strange.

name: Mid90s
actors: Sunny Suljic, Katherine Waterston, Lucas Hedges, Na-kel Smith
description: Follows Stevie, a thirteen-year-old in 1990s-era Los Angeles who spends his summer navigating between his troubled home life and a group of new friends that he meets at a Motor Avenue skate shop.

name: Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran
actors: John Abraham, Boman Irani, Diana Penty, Anuja Sathe
description: A look at India's second confidential nuclear test series at Pokhran led by Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam, during the time of PM Atal Bihari Vajpayee's tenure.

name: Cam
actors: Madeline Brewer, Patch Darragh, Melora Walters, Devin Druid
description: Alice, an ambitious camgirl, wakes up one day to discover she's been replaced on her show with an exact replica of herself.

name: The Nutcracker and the Four Realms
actors: Mackenzie Foy, Keira Knightley, Morgan Freeman, Helen Mirren
description: A young girl is transported into a magical world of gingerbread soldiers and an army of mice.

actors: Rajinikanth, Akshay Kumar, Amy Jackson, Adil Hussain
description: Dr Vaseegaran (Rajinikanth) and his android assistant Nila (Amy Jackson) are called in for help after mobiles start mysteriously flying out of the hands of people in Chennai. Vaseegaran summons his trusted robot Chitti (Rajinikanth) to ward off the bird-shaped supernatural powers of Pakshirajan (Akshay Kumar).

name: The Outsider
actors: Jared Leto, Tadanobu Asano, Kippei Shîna, Shioli Kutsuna
description: An epic set in post-WWII Japan and centered on an American former G.I. who joins the yakuza.

name: Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety
actors: Kartik Aaryan, Nushrat Bharucha, Sunny Singh Nijjar, Alok Nath
description: Titu is going to marry a perfect woman named Sweety. Titu's best-friend Sonu doubts Sweety's character and tries to break the marriage while Sweety tries to do opposite and which leads to war between Bromance and Romance.

name: The Happytime Murders
actors: Melissa McCarthy, Elizabeth Banks, Maya Rudolph, Leslie David Baker
description: When the puppet cast of a '90s children's TV show begin to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case.

name: Early Man
actors: Eddie Redmayne, Tom Hiddleston, Maisie Williams, Timothy Spall
description: Set at the dawn of time, when prehistoric creatures and woolly mammoths roamed the earth, Early Man tells the story of Dug, along with sidekick Hognob as they unite his tribe against a mighty enemy Lord Nooth and his Bronze Age City to save their home.

name: Rangasthalam
actors: Ram Charan, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Aadhi, Jagapathi Babu
description: The fear of his elder brother's death starts to haunt an innocent, hearing impaired guy after they both join forces to overthrow the unlawful 30 year long regime of their village's president.

name: Like Father
actors: Kristen Bell, Danielle Davenport, Kimiko Glenn, Wynter Kullman
description: After she's left at the altar, a workaholic advertising executive ends up on her Caribbean honeymoon cruise with her estranged father.

name: Padman
actors: Akshay Kumar, Radhika Apte, Sonam Kapoor, Jyoti Subhash
description: Upon realizing the extent to which women are affected by their menses, a man sets out to create a sanitary pad machine and to provide inexpensive sanitary pads to the women of rural India.

name: Midnight Sun
actors: Bella Thorne, Patrick Schwarzenegger, Rob Riggle, Quinn Shephard
description: A 17-year-old girl suffers from a condition that prevents her from being out in the sunlight.

name: Thugs of Hindostan
actors: Aamir Khan, Amitabh Bachchan, Katrina Kaif, Fatima Sana Shaikh
description: A story about one man's love for his nation and another's love for power. An epic adventure filled with edge-of-the-seat thrills and war on the seas.

name: Blindspotting
actors: Daveed Diggs, Rafael Casal, Janina Gavankar, Jasmine Cephas Jones
description: While on probation, a man begins to re-evaluate his relationship with his volatile best friend.

name: The Hurricane Heist
actors: Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace, Ryan Kwanten, Ralph Ineson
description: Thieves attempt a massive heist against the U.S. Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its Mint facilities.

name: Calibre
actors: Jack Lowden, Martin McCann, Tony Curran, Ian Pirie
description: A shocking deed turned their weekend trip into a nightmare. Now their only hope is to swallow their paranoia and act normal.

name: The Hate U Give
actors: Amandla Stenberg, Regina Hall, Russell Hornsby, Anthony Mackie
description: Starr witnesses the fatal shooting of her childhood best friend Khalil at the hands of a police officer. Now, facing pressure from all sides of the community, Starr must find her voice and stand up for what's right.

name: Boy Erased
actors: Lucas Hedges, Nicole Kidman, Joel Edgerton, Russell Crowe
description: The son of a Baptist preacher is forced to participate in a church-supported gay conversion program after being forcibly outed to his parents.

name: Beirut
actors: Jon Hamm, Jay Potter, Khalid Benchagra, Ania Josse
description: Caught in the crossfires of civil war, CIA operatives must send a former U.S. diplomat to negotiate for the life of a friend he left behind.

name: Doragon bôru chô: Burorî
actors: Masako Nozawa, Aya Hisakawa, Ryô Horikawa, Toshio Furukawa
description: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

name: Fahrenheit 451
actors: Michael B. Jordan, Aaron Davis, Cindy Katz, Michael Shannon
description: In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman...and begins to rebel against society.

name: Terminal
actors: Margot Robbie, Simon Pegg, Dexter Fletcher, Mike Myers
description: A film noir taking place in a train terminal at night. Add 2 male assassins, female assassin, waitress, teacher, janitor and crime boss. Add revenge. Who says mystery is a lost art?

name: Todos lo saben
actors: Penélope Cruz, Javier Bardem, Ricardo Darín, Eduard Fernández
description: Laura, a Spanish woman living in Buenos Aires, returns to her hometown outside Madrid with her two children to attend her sister's wedding. However, the trip is upset by unexpected events that bring secrets into the open.

name: Destination Wedding
actors: Keanu Reeves, Winona Ryder, Dj Dallenbach, Greg Lucey
description: The story of two miserable and unpleasant wedding guests, Lindsay and Frank, who develop a mutual affection despite themselves.

name: Simmba
actors: Ranveer Singh, Sara Ali Khan, Sonu Sood, Ashutosh Rana
description: Simmba, a Corrupt Officer, enjoys all the perks of being an immoral and unethical police officer until a life-changing event forces him to choose the righteous path.

name: Batman Ninja
actors: Kôichi Yamadera, Wataru Takagi, Ai Kakuma, Rie Kugimiya
description: Batman, along with a number of his allies and adversaries, finds himself transplanted from modern Gotham City to feudal Japan.

name: Bharat Ane Nenu
actors: Mahesh Babu, Kiara Advani, Prakash Raj, Sarath Kumar
description: To make good on a promise he made to his mother, a university graduate returns to India and becomes disillusioned by the government corruption he encounters.

name: The Princess Switch
actors: Vanessa Hudgens, Sam Palladio, Nick Sagar, Alexa Adeosun
description: A Chicago baker (V.Hudgens) is competing in a Christmas baking competition in Belgravia. There she bumps into the prince's fiancee. They look alike and switch for 2 days. "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans."

name: The Week Of
actors: Adam Sandler, Chris Rock, Steve Buscemi, Rachel Dratch
description: Two fathers with opposing personalities come together to celebrate the wedding of their children. They are forced to spend the longest week of their lives together, and the big day cannot come soon enough.

name: White Boy Rick
actors: Matthew McConaughey, Richie Merritt, Bel Powley, Jennifer Jason Leigh
description: The story of teenager Richard Wershe Jr., who became an undercover informant for the FBI during the 1980s and was ultimately arrested for drug-trafficking and sentenced to life in prison.

name: The Night Comes for Us
actors: Iko Uwais, Julie Estelle, Joe Taslim, Zack Lee
description: Ito (Joe Taslim), a gangland enforcer, caught amidst a treacherous and violent insurrection within his Triad crime family upon his return home from a stint abroad.

name: Don't Worry, He Won't Get Far on Foot
actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Jonah Hill, Rooney Mara, Jack Black
description: On the rocky path to sobriety after a life-changing accident, John Callahan discovers the healing power of art, willing his injured hands into drawing hilarious, often controversial cartoons, which bring him a new lease on life.

name: Tumbbad
directors: Rahi Anil Barve, Anand Gandhi, Adesh Prasad
actors: Sohum Shah, Jyoti Malshe, Anita Date, Ronjini Chakraborty
description: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

name: Bad Samaritan
actors: David Tennant, Robert Sheehan, Kerry Condon, Carlito Olivero
description: A pair of burglars stumble upon a woman being held captive in a home they intended to rob.

name: At Eternity's Gate
actors: Willem Dafoe, Rupert Friend, Oscar Isaac, Mads Mikkelsen
description: A look at the life of painter Vincent van Gogh during the time he lived in Arles and Auvers-sur-Oise, France.

name: Ibiza
actors: Gwen Elizabeth Duchon, Gillian Jacobs, Michaela Watkins, Phoebe Robinson
description: A young American woman and her two best friends seek out a hot DJ in Spain.

name: Every Day
actors: Angourie Rice, Justice Smith, Debby Ryan, Jeni Ross
description: A shy teenager falls for someone who transforms into another person every day.

name: Under the Silver Lake
actors: Andrew Garfield, Riley Keough, Topher Grace, Callie Hernandez
description: Sam, intelligent but without purpose, finds a mysterious woman swimming in his apartment's pool one night. The next morning, she disappears. Sam sets off across LA to find her, and along the way he uncovers a conspiracy far more bizarre.

name: Unfriended: Dark Web
actors: Colin Woodell, Stephanie Nogueras, Betty Gabriel, Rebecca Rittenhouse
description: A teen comes into possession of a new laptop and soon discovers that the previous owner is not only watching him, but will also do anything to get it back.

name: Teen Titans Go! To the Movies
actors: Greg Cipes, Scott Menville, Khary Payton, Tara Strong
description: A villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks five teenage superheroes who dream of Hollywood stardom.

name: Raid
actors: Ajay Devgn, Saurabh Shukla, Ileana D'Cruz, Amit Sial
description: A fearless income tax officer raids the mansion of the most powerful man in Lucknow after someone mysteriously draws his attention towards the evidence.

name: Mulk
actors: Tapsee Pannu, Rishi Kapoor, Prateik, Ashutosh Rana
description: One family member tries to help her own family which are trapped in a dark controversy.
